El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio, surtirlo con mas variedad de productos asi obtendrá mejores ganancias y poder mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor. Esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa e insumos para la elaboracion de comidas.
texts.en:
The “Unión y Confianza Duo”

Felisa, one of the duo, is from Tecpán municipality. She is 51 years old and has three children – two girls and one boy – under the age of 18 and who need to be looked after. Felisa makes a living selling meals and clothing at Tecpán municipal market.

Thanks to the support of her daughters, Felisa continues to move forward with her business. 

This loan will be used to buy supplies for preparing meals, a trade that Felisa has been doing for a number of years.

Felisa’s dream is to expand her business further, to stock it up with more products, and to earn a higher income in order to send her children to school and give them a better future.

Felisa is applying for this loan in order to buy clothes, and supplies to produce meals to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes, and supplies to produce meals to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Melida

texts.es: Con 36 años de edad Blanca muestra cada día sus deseos de salir adelante, actualmente vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus 3 hijos 1 varón de 10 años y dos niñas de 12 y 9 años de edad a los que logra sacar adelante con el apoyo de su compañero de vida. Blanca se dedica desde hace 8 años a la crianza y posterior venta de pollos de engorde actividad que le permite sacar adelante a su familia. Blanca desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda, ya que siente que el espacio en ella es muy reducido, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda para mejorar los espacios de la misma.
texts.en:
Blanca is 36 years old. Every day, she demonstrates her desire to get ahead. She currently lives in her own home, along with her children. She has one son who is 10 years old, and two daughters who are 12 and 9. She is able to get ahead thanks to the support of her domestic partner. 
For the past 8 years, Blanca has been in the business of raising and selling chickens. This activity allows her to provide for her family. 
She would like to build a new room in her home because the space currently feels very cramped. For this project she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron. These materials will be used to build a bedroom in her home which will make the house feel more spacious.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a bedroom in her house.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en:
Emilia is a married mother of 2 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 47 years old, and 1 of her children is currently in school.

Emilia has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase additional materials for her fishing business.

Emilia has been in this business for 20 years now. She would like to build and expand her business so she can secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Maria Lola

texts.es: Maria Lola tiene 30 años de edad es soltera vive en Guaranda Provincia de Bolivar, ella se dedica  a la agricultura y a la cria de animales, solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos agricolas para sembrar papas, y comprar una vaca para producir quesos para obtener otro inggreso, su sueño es tener una granja con muchos animales, su desafio es el clima y en su tiempo libre le gusta viajar.
texts.en: Maria Lola is 30 years old, is single, and lives in Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar.  She works in agriculture and raises animals.  She is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies to grow potatoes, and to buy a cow to produce cheese in order to earn additional income. Her dream is to have a farm with many animals.  The challenge she faces is the weather.  In her free time she likes to travel.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and a cow.

loans.name: Silvana Maritza

texts.es:
Silvana es una joven ecuatoriana que tiene 22 años nació en la ciudad de Latacunga en la parroquia La Matriz perteneciente a  la República del Ecuador, actualmente se encuentra casasda con Wilson, tiene dos hijos un de 3 y otro de 1 año, gracias su esfuerzo y sacrificio viven en casa propia desde hace varios años, aquí vive junto a su esposo e hijos, 
Su esposo es quien le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, los dos son alfareros, fabrican vasijas de barro  desde hace varios años, esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres, además en esta zona la mayoría de la gente se dedica a la alfarería ya que esta es la tierra conocida como la del alfarero y folklor.
Su mayor  obstáculo en su vida ha sido tener que superar la separación de sus padres, pues fue cuando era niña y fue muy duro para ella y sus hermanos tener que pasar por este proceso doloroso. 
Este negocio fue heredado por su madre quien al no poder seguir atendiendo lo dejo y Silvana atiende, ahora lo hace junto a su esposo Silvana es una joven muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
Por el momento está solicitando  un crédito para la compra de material, este sería su segunda operación. 
Silvana y su esposo quieren extender su  agradecimiento y felicitación a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Silvana is a young Ecuadorian woman who is 22 years old. She was born in the city of Latacunga, in La Matriz parish, in the Republic of Ecuador. She is now married to Wilson and has two children, one three years old, and the other one year old.  Thanks to their efforts and sacrifice they have owned their house for several years. Silvana lives here with her husband and children.

Her husband is the one who helps with household expenses. Both are potters, and have been making clay pots for several years. She learned this work from her parents. Also, the majority of people in this area make pottery because the region is known for clay pottery and folklore.  

Her biggest obstacle in life has been trying to overcome her parents' separation, since it happened when she was a child, and it was very hard for her and her siblings go through this painful process.  

She inherited this business from her mother who couldn't continue the work any more, and so left it to Silvana, who now does the work with her husband. Silvana is a very hard-working and enterprising young woman. 

 At the moment she is requesting a loan to purchase materials. This would be her second loan cycle.  

Silvana and her husband want to express their thanks and best wishes to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva, for making this growth in their work and personal life possible.

loans.use: to buy materials in order to make more clay pots and allow their business to develop.

loans.name: Flaviana

texts.en:
Flaviana lives in Ermera and she is a businesswoman. She has been involved in business activities since 2010, with her own working capital and she makes the best of it. She has very great interest in doing business. 

She has a small store, so she is requesting the loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve her management of her business. So, she is taking a loan of USD 1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional items to keep in her store, including noodles, pens, notebooks, water, cigarettes, biscuits, eggs, detergent, and other things to sell.

loans.use: to buy noodles, pens, notebooks, water, cigarettes, biscuits, eggs, detergent, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Mahinai

texts.ru: Ее зовут Махинаи. Ей 25 лет. Она добрая, отзывчивая и гостеприимная хозяйка. У нее есть двое детей. Финансовое положение ее семьи не самое лучшее и определенный источник дохода в семейный бюджет отсутствует. Ее муж работает разнорабочим, и постоянное место работы не имеет. Махинаи не может больше так продолжать. Ее дети растут и скоро они пойдут в школу. Детям придется оплачивать образование, покупать учебники и формы. Махинаи хочет начать свой бизнес. Она будет продавать фрукты и овощи. Махинаи будет стараться и держать этот бизнес, чтобы как то улучшить их жизненные условия. Она будет Вам очень благодарна, если Вы ей поможете.
texts.en: Her name is Mahinai. She is 25 years old and a kind, responsive and welcoming homemaker. She has two children. Her family's financial situation is not the best due to the absence of the set source of income for the family's budget. Her husband works as a handyman and does not have a permanent place of employment. Mahinai is unable to go on like this. Her children are growing up and will soon start school. Their education, books and uniforms will have to be paid for. Mahinai wants to start her own business. She will sell fruits and vegetables. Mahinai will try her best to run this business in order to improve her family's living conditions. She will be very grateful to You if You help her.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in order to start her own business

loans.name: Delmy Elizabeth

texts.es: Delmy es una mujer de 40 años de edad habita con su esposo y su hijo de 23 años de edad en vivienda propia la cual lograron construir a base de mucho esfuerzo desde hace 23 años. Buscando la manera de sacar adelante a su familia Delmy se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir de forma ambulante, por lo que recorre las calles y caseríos cercanos además los fines de semana visita el mercado municipal donde tiene muchos clientes. La vivienda en la que Delmy habita es bastante pequeña, y siente que necesita un poco más de espacio, es por ello que ha decidido construir un cuarto dormitorio y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, grava, ladrillo y lámina para construir un cuarto dormitorio para su ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en: Delmy is a 40-year-old woman who lives with her husband and son, 23 years old, in their own house which they managed to build with a lot of effort 23 years ago. Seeking for a way to get her family ahead, Delmy works selling clothing as a street vendor, so she goes around the streets and villages nearby and on the weekend she goes to the municipal market where she has many customers. The house in which Delmy lives is rather small, and she feels it needs a bit more space, so she has decided to build a bedroom and for this she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in cement, gravel, bricks, and metal sheeting to build a bedroom to enlarge her house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, gravel, brick, and metal sheeting to build a bedroom to enlarge her house.

loans.name: Mateo Eduardo

texts.es: Mateo de 38 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz, maicillo y cacahuate, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, es padre soltero vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia, Mateo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Mateo, 38 years old, has worked for the past 20 years in agriculture. He plants corn, sorghum, and peanuts. He sells his products in the different markets that are near his home. His is a single father who lives with his two children in his own house. Mateo is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc. and improve the land that is shown in the photo to be able to continue with his work and have more income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 25 años, experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de vender una buena calidad de producto por esa razón posee clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito ya que necesita comprar las herramientas necesarias para continuar con su trabajo como: trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos.
texts.en: Julio, 40 years old, lives in his own house with his wife. He has worked at traditional fishing for the past 25 years, experience which has given him the opportunity to sell a good quality product, and for this reason, he has regular customers.  He is asking for a loan since he needs to purchase the necessary tools to continue with his work such as trammel nets, nets, and to do repairs on his boat, since this is his only source of work and income.

loans.use: to purchase trammel nets, nets, and do repairs on his boat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase many ingredients for cakes such as flavor, sugar, butter, brown sugar, and other items.

loans.name: Manuela Yovana

texts.es:
Manuela Yovana tiene 33 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo a su cargo , vive en casa familiar; en el dsitrito de Oyotun,la cual es una zona rural. que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Manuela se dedica a brindar servicios de tipeado, impresiones, escaneos, la cual su negocio se encuentra en su domicilio; hace mas de 3 años; con muy buenas referencias, ella solicita préstamo para invertir en Activo fijo; compra de una impresora laser y otros accesorios para realizar su trabajo; esto le servirá para poder dar un mejor servicio para sus clientes y tener mayores ingresos, de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Manuela Yovana is 33 years old. She is single, with one son in her care. She lives in her family home in the Oyotun district, a rural area within the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region of Peru's northern coast. The residents of this district work mainly in agriculture, livestock production, and commerce.

Manuela has earned her living providing typing, printing, and scanning services for more than three years. Her business is located in her home, and she has very good references. She is requesting a loan to invest in fixed assets; she will buy a laser printer and other accessories to carry out her work. This will allow her to provide a better service for her customers and have a greater income. In this way, she will improve her own quality of life as well as that of her customers.

loans.use: to buy a laser printer and other accessories for doing her work

loans.name: Catalino

texts.es: Don Catalino de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, maicillo y cacahuate, tiene 30 años de dedicarse a la actividad agrícola, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insecticidas, herbicidas, abonos y fertilizantes y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder tener una buena cosecha y así obtener mejores ganancias económicas para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Catalino is 57 years old and lives in his own home with his three children.  He works growing corn, sorghum, and peanuts.  He has been farming for 30 years, and sells his produce in the various markets around his home.  What he makes from his sales goes to cover some of the household expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy insecticides, herbicides, manure, and fertilizer, and improve the land which is seen in the photo.  This is in order to have a good harvest and in this way increase his income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, herbicides, manure, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en: Delia is married and has worked steadily selling dry goods in the Philippines for the past twenty years. She has applied for a 30,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy more inventory such as belts, sunglasses and flashlights to sell. She is always working hard to secure a good future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her dry goods business

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en:
Eugenia is 66 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Eugenia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 Philippines Peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, biscuits, candies, detergent soap, shampoo, and other items. 

Eugenia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is widowed and works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Jovita has been in this business for five years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
Virginia continúa con su actividad de manicura. El préstamo que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de material de trabajo de manicura (sentada en la silla). El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas. Sus deseos de superación la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de sándwiches, artesanía en cerámica, venta de refrescos, librería, venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de fruta, venta de tomates, llantería, servicio de construcción y venta de pollos, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la manicura, ella tiene por ocupación el cuidado y embellecimiento de las manos y en especial, el cuidado y pintura de las uñas. Paralelamente a su negocio, ella se encuentra emprendiendo en el negocio de bisutería, en la venta de; manillas, anillos, collares, amarra pelo, etc., negocio que va de la mano con su otra actividad, “inicié el negocio de bisutería porque mi clientas me piden accesorios para sus fiestas o para usar a diario...” comenta. La ventaja de sus actividades es que se relacionan entre sí, la desventaja es la falta de capital para invertir en la compra de bisutería. Su sueño es estabilizar ambas actividades, Ella desea realizar la compra de bisutería para cumplir con los pedidos pendientes y brindar una mejor atención en su negocio. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Virginia solicita un préstamo para la compra de bisutería para iniciar un nuevo negocio y cumplir con sus pedidos pendientes.
texts.en:
Virginia continues with her manicure business. She invested the loan which she obtained in the purchase of manicure materials (Virginia is sitting in the chair in the photo). The payment of her dues was punctual, since she did not have problems.

Her wishes to improve resulted in her leading a Communal Bank of people to request a loan to improve their work. Their businesses include: sandwich sales, ceramic crafts, refreshment sales, book shop, secondhand clothing sales, sales of fruits, sales of tomatoes, tire shop, construction services, and sales of chicken.

For her job, Virginia takes care of embellishing the hands, specifically giving attention to the nails and painting them. Parallel to this activity, she started the business of imitation jewelry sales, including sales of bracelets, rings, necklaces, hair ties, etc. This business goes hand in hand with her other work. "I started the imitation jewelry business because my customers would ask for accessories for parties or for daily use," comments Virginia. 

The advantage of her jobs is that they are related with each other. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to invest in the purchase of jewelry. 

Her dream is to stabilize both businesses. She wishes to purchase imitation jewelry to meet the pending demands and to give better attention to her work.

This is the second sequence of loans she has had with this institution, during the 8 years that she has grown her business. For these reasons, Virginia is requesting a loan to purchase imitation jewelry in order to to start a new business.

loans.use: to purchase __ to start a new business and to meet the pending demand

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es: Don Cristino de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, maicillo y cacahuate, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 30 años y gracias a su trabajo ha logrado salir adelante con su hogar, el comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas etc. y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Cristino is 56 years old and lives in his own home with his three children.  He grows corn, sorghum, and peanuts.  He has done this work for 30 years and thanks to his hard work, has gotten his family ahead.  He sells his produce in the adjacent towns.  He is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, herbicides, and other supplies.  In this way he will increase his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, herbicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Solidario Magaly De San Pedro Group

texts.es: Solidario Magaly de San Pedro La encargada de este grupo es la señora Marisol quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos en general desde hace 3 años. Su sueño es tener una gran tienda de cosméticos en un local propio en el mercado. Tiene varios pedidos de cremas, perfumes, shampoo, para damas, caballeros y niños, pero el dinero que tiene no le alcanza y por tal motivo necesita otro crédito para no quedarles mal a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Solidario Magaly from San Pedro.

The one in charge of this group is Marisol, who has sold general cosmetics for 3 years. Her dream is to have a great cosmetics store in her own locale in the market. She has several orders for creams, perfumes, and shampoo for women, men and children, but the money she has isn't enough. That is why she needs another loan to not disappoint her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Mainor Antonio

texts.es: Mainor de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, él se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 5 años, comercializa sus productos agrícolas y cerdos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cerdos, comida y concentrado y mejorar el corral donde los mantiene y así poder seguir  con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Mainor is 34 years old. He lives in his own home with his life's companion and their daughter. He has raised pigs and grown basic grains for 5 years. He sells his farm products and pigs in the different markets nearby his home. He is asking for a loan to buy more pigs, feed and concentrate and improve the pen where he keeps them. This way, he can continue with his work to have better income.

loans.use: to buy more pigs, feed and concentrate, as well as improve the pen where he keeps them.

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Nga is 49 years old and married.
She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years.
Nga lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.
She comes from a low-income household in the village 
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.
In 2015, Nga joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Nga has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
With her business profit, Nga hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare tires and to pay for repair and maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new fishing nets

loans.name: Grecilda

texts.en:
Grecilda is 38 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Grecilda is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 Philippines Peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Grecilda has been raising livestock for 10 years now and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Grecilda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Joena

texts.en:
Joena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Joena requested a 10,000 Philippines Peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business. She has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Joena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Krestle Renee

texts.en:
Krestle Renee is 29 years old and married. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who has a bamboo strips weaving business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials like bamboo for her business.

Krestle Renee has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more materials like bamboo for her business

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 56 years old and married. She earns a living by farming sugarcane and corn in the Philippines. Leonila is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Leonila has been farming sugarcane and corn for five years and also earns income from raising livestock. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Jesús Eduardo

texts.es: Inició su propio negocio gracias a su perseverancia y espíritu emprendedor, Jesús de 30 años, al quedar desempleado decidió invertir en la compra de lavadoras para ofrecer en alquiler a los vecinos del barrio en el que habita al suroccidente de Barranquilla, así mismo combinó actividades que le proporcionarían ingresos adicionales y que realiza muy bien; albañilería y mensajería.  Hace cinco años sus vecinos y conocidos que no cuentan con este electrodoméstico en casa,  alquilan por horas las lavadoras y realizan esta labor más confortablemente, sobre todo las amas de casa, así mismo les representa un ahorro en agua puesto que el lavado a mano genera más gasto de este recurso natural.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en la compra de dos lavadoras para responder a servicios que ha dejado desatendidos por no contar con la capacidad necesaria. Jesús es padre de dos hijas menores de edad a quienes ofrece bienestar fruto de su trabajo.  Su meta es incrementar la capacidad de su negocio para generar más ingresos para  su familia.
texts.en: He began his own business thanks to his perseverance and enterprising spirit. When Jesús, 30 years old, was unemployed, he decided to invest in the purchase of washing machines to rent them to the people in the neighborhood where he lives to the southwest of Barranquilla, which he also combined with work that would provide additional income and that he does very well: bricklaying and courier service. For the past five years, his neighbors and acquaintances who did not have this appliance in their home have rented the washing machines by the hour and they do this work more comfortably, especially the housewives, and also he gives them a savings in water since washing by hand wastes more of this natural resource. Currently, he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to invest in the purchase of two washing machines to respond to the service that he has had to leave unattended because he didn't have the necessary capacity. Jesús is the father of two young daughters to whom he offers well-being, the fruit of his work. His goal is to increase the capacity of his business to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase two washing machines.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad works hard to support her family. Natividad is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Natividad requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fabric, thread, and needles her business.

Natividad has been in this business for five years now.

Natividad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fabric, thread, and needles . for her business

loans.name: Marylin

texts.en:
Marylin is 44 years old and married. Marylin works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Marylin has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from vegetable vending.

Marylin aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Noe Cruz

texts.es: Noé tiene. 35 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su padre  a quien  apoya con los gastos de la casa. Noé es un hombre emprendedor  que se dedica a la labor de albañilería de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana   se desempeñan como vendedor de  ropa para dama y  caballero, la cual comercializa en las calles  con más afluencia de  personas  dentro del  mercado de su localidad.  Noé cuenta con muchos cliente  y así mismo muchas personas que pasan por el lugar al ver su producto se detienen a comprarle, en vista de esto Noé solicita crédito a FUSAI  y así poder tener el dinero necesario que le permita comprar mayor cantidad de ropa, en diferentes tallas, colores y estampados, ya que una de las principales razones por la cual las personas se acercan a su negocio es por lo llamativo de su producto. Para él es de  mucha importancia el mejorar sus ventas, debido a que es por medio de  su negocio logra solventar muchos  de los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Noé is 35 years old and lives in his own house along with his father whom he helps with living expenses. Noé is an entrepreneurial man who makes his living with masonry work Monday through Friday and on the weekends he acts as a vendor of men and women's clothing, which he sells on the more affluent roads in the market district. 

Noé has many customers, but also many people who pass by his place see his product and stop and buy them. Because of this, Noé is requesting this loan from FUSAI to be able to have the money necessary to allow him to buy a larger quantity of clothing in different sizes, colors and patterns. One of the main reasons people stop by his business is because his products are eye-catching. 

For him it is very important to improve his sales, since it is through his business that he is able to pay many of his living expenses.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantity of clothing in different sizes, colors and patterns to improve his sales.

loans.name: Norma Esperanza

texts.es: Norma de 30 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su dos hijos, ella posee un taller de costura desde hace 5 años, gracias a su trabajo es como puede salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir el cuarto que muestra en la fotografía, pero como no posee de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena, polines, laminas y pago de mano de obra y así poder terminar de arreglar su casa para una mejor comodidad y seguridad para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Norma is 30 years old and is a single mother who lives in her own home with her two children.  She has had a tailoring workshop for five years, and thanks to her hard work she can get ahead.  

She wants to improve her home by finishing construction of the room seen in the photo, but as she does not have enough money, she is requesting a loan.  She will buy cement, bricks, sand, beams, metal sheets, and pay for labor.  In this way she will be able to finish repairing her home, and have more comfort and safety for her children.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, beams, metal sheets, and pay for labor for home construction.

loans.name: Bảy

texts.en:
Mrs Bảy is 61 years old and she is married. She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years. Bảy lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa Province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region.  Her family is drinking salinity water. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

In 2015, Bảy joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Bảy has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profits, Bảy hopes to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine.

loans.name: Quyên

texts.en:
Quyên is 48 years old and married.
She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years.
Quyên lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.
She comes from a low-income household in the village with a limited market for busniess. 
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
In 2015, Quyên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Quyên has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
With her business profit, Quyên hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Liên

texts.en:
Liên is 39 years old and married.

She has worked in marine aquaculture for more than 10 years.

Liên lives in a semi-urban town in Hoang Hoa district, in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village. The market demand is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns Liên is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a water filter machine to produce clean water.

This is Liên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Liên hopes for her business to do well, so she can make enough money to provide for her kids and be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a water filter machine.

loans.name: Lương

texts.en:
Lương, 45, lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in this village. She has sold dry goods and other general merchandise for more than 10 years, but the market need is low in this region.

One of Lương’s most critical concerns is her family’s lack of clean water to drink. She is applying for a 1,620,000 VND loan, her first, through Kiva's field partner Thanh Hoa to buy a water filtration appliance.

Lương hopes for her business to do well, make enough money to provide for her children, and be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her trade.

loans.use: to buy a water filtration appliance for her home.

loans.name: Nguyệt

texts.en:
Mrs Nguyệt is 65 years old and she is married. She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years. Nguyệt lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa Province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms, because it is near the sea. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

In 2014, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Nguyệt has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profits, Nguyệt hopes for her business to do well, to travel for vacation within the country, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine.

loans.name: Trang

texts.en:
Trang is 23 years old and married.
She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years.
Trang lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.
She is from a low-income household in the village with a job that is unstable . 
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
This is Trang first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
Trang hopes for her business to do well, to buy a cell phone, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 41 years old and has four children. Nancy is married and has four children who are in school. She is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Nancy requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Nancy has been raising livestock for 20 years now, and has borrowed 20 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Nancy would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Nelpa

texts.en:
Nelpa is a 40-year-old married mother of two children, both in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Nelpa has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. Nelpa requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish and ingredients for her business.

Nelpa has been in this business for five years. In the future, Nelpa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish and ingredients for her business

loans.name: Noneta

texts.en:
Noneta works hard to support her family. Noneta is married and has a salt-vending business in the Philippines.

Noneta requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of salt to sell.

Noneta has been in this business for 10 years now.

Noneta would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of salt to sell

loans.name: Normalyn

texts.en:
Normalyn is a 35-year-old married mother of three children, one in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Normalyn has a dried-fish vending business in the Philippines. Normalyn requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish and ingredients for her dried-fish business.

Normalyn has been in this business for one year. Normalyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and ingredients for her dried-fish business

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 48 years old and she earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Merlinda is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Merlinda has been in pig fattening for 20 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Rosa es una clienta de gran trayectoria en la organización, por su moral de pago y gestión crediticia, este es el noveno crédito que solicita y es clienta de la Fundación desde 1998. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora que siempre ha procurado mantener su independencia económica y mejorar su calidad de vida. Además es una mujer muy activa, a sus 71 años cuenta con toda la motivación y fuerzas para seguir desarrollando su negocio, sumado a su excelente salud física. Doña Rosa vive con su esposo que ya está jubilado, una hija, su yerno y 2 nietos, a los que siempre ayuda económicamente. Tiene más de 20 años de haber iniciado su actividad comercial, siempre en el área de venta de alimentos, sus primeros pasos fueron vendiendo empanadas, gallos  y repostería en una fábrica donde trabajaba su hijo mayor, también se dio a conocer en La Escuela de Loyola, cuando pasaba a dejarle algo de comer a su hija que cursaba la primaria en esa institución, fue ahí donde el director del centro educativo le ofreció un puesto dentro de la escuela, mediante un kiosco propiedad de una empresa de bebidas gaseosas vende; refrescos, jugos, frescoleches, helados, galletas, productos de paquete, golosinas, semillas, también comidas rápidas como empanadas, hamburguesas, perros calientes, gallos y repostería de todo tipo. Durante todo este tiempo ella ha logrado consolidar su negocio, asegurándose la permanencia en la institución, su siguiente objetivo a corto plazo es contar con mejores instalaciones para su soda, algo que ya la Junta de Educación de la escuela  aprobó, lo que significa que van a construir una pequeña soda con más espacio para mobiliario, a diferencia del kiosco con el que cuenta actualmente.  
En este momento la clienta necesita reforzar su patrimonio ya que inicio con nuevos proyectos siempre relacionados a la venta de alimentos, así mismo enfocada en la construcción de la nueva soda,  debe fortalecer su equipo y mobiliario.   Sus clientes son todos los estudiantes y profesores del centro educativo, además de los que asisten a la escuela nocturna, a la que también vende todos los días por las noches. Su no tiene competencia dentro del centro educativo. En cuanto a estacionalidad en periodos de vacaciones ella sigue vendiendo la repostería en una fábrica de vidrios cercanos, así como la venta de semillas y algunas golosinas que ella misma empaca se las vende a un distribuidor. 
Este nuevo crédito representa la oportunidad de renovar su equipo, ya que algunos de sus artefactos se encuentran un poco deteriorados, así como invertir en mercadería para desarrollar con más fuerza el negocio de empaque y venta de semillas y golosinas.
texts.en:
Rosa is a client with a great trajectory in this organization, due to her responsible payments and credit management.  This is the ninth loan that she has requested and has been a client of the foundation since 1998.  She is a very enterprising woman who has always sought to maintain her economic independence and improve her quality of life.  She is also a very active woman; at 71 years of age, she has all of the motivation and strength necessary to continue growing her business, in addition her excellent health.  Rosa lives with her husband who is now retired, one daughter, her son-in-law and two grandsons, who she always helps economically.

She has more than 20 years of experience after having started her commercial profession, all in the area of food sales.  She started by selling empanadas, chicken and pastries at a factory where her older brother worked.  She also made herself known at the Loyola School, when she went to leave something to eat for her child who was studying in elementary school at this institution.  It was there that the director of the education center offered her a position at the school at a kiosk belonging to a soft drink company and sold soda, juice, milk, ice cream, cookies, pre-packaged snacks, seeds, and also fast foods like empanadas, hamburgers, hot dogs, chicken and all kinds of pastries.  During this time, she has managed to consolidate her business, ensuring her place in the institution.  Her next short-term goal is to have better equipment for her stall, which the Board of Education approved, meaning that they are going to build a small stall with more space for merchandise, which is different from the kiosk that she currently has.

Right now, the client needs to strengthen her assets, since she started new projects related to food sales, with a similar focus as that of the kiosk.  She must improve her equipment and merchandise.  Her clients are all students and professors from the educational center, in addition to night school attendees, to whom she sells every day in the evening.  She doesn’t have competition within the educational center.  Regarding her seasonality during vacation times, she continues selling pastries at a glass factory nearby, as well as seeds and some sweets that she packs up and sells to a distributor. 
This new loan presents an opportunity to update her equipment, since some of her appliances are a little deteriorated, as well as invest in merchandise to better grow her business packing and selling seeds and sweets.

loans.use: to purchase equipment such as a sealing machine, a food scale, an electric griddle and other appliances, as well as general merchandise for the kiosk

loans.name: Fernando Emilio

texts.es: El negocio de Sastrería de Fernando inició gracias a su cónyuge, quien hace quince años  le propuso que aprendiera este arte en el cual ella podría ser su maestra puesto que desde joven se ha dedicado a esta actividad, él acepto con mucho entusiasmo y al convertirse en un experto organizó su taller en el que produce pantalones, camisas, ropa multiusos y adicionalmente el servicio de clínica de ropa; él se encuentra satisfecho con los resultados obtenidos pues con la actividad de la confección ha logrado el sustento diario de su familia. El apoyo de su cónyuge fue fundamental para establecer su propio negocio, pues a pesar de que nunca había confeccionado una prenda de vestir, las ganas de salir adelante lo impulsaron a aprender dicho arte, ha perfeccionado su técnica y cada día es lo hace mejor. Su taller está ubicado en su casa donde atiende los pedidos de su clientela conformado por vecinos familiares y referidos; Fernando tiene la necesidad de reparar dos de sus máquinas para lo cual está tramitando un credikiva a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, recursos con los que adicionalmente planea invertir en telas y otros insumos para confeccionar y comercializar pantalones camisas y ropa multiusos en los almacenes del comercio de Barranquilla. Su desafío es la ampliación de su taller con la adquisición de nuevas máquinas, la contratación de operarias que le permitan un mejor ingreso y a futuro remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en: Fernando's tailoring business was begun thanks to his spouse who, fifteen years ago, suggested that he learn this art in which she could be his teacher since she has done this work since she was young. He accepted enthusiastically and upon becoming an expert, he established his workshop in which he makes pants, shirts, multipurpose clothing in addition to the service of a clothing clinic. He is satisfied with the results he has gotten since, with this tailoring work, he has managed to sustain his family. The support of his spouse was fundamental to establishing his own business, since despite having never made clothing, the desire to get ahead pushed him to learn this art. He has perfected his technique and every day he does it better. His shop is located in his house where he works on the orders from his customers, who are his neighbors, family members, and people referred to him. Fernando needs to repair two of his machines so he is applying for a Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, resources with which he additionally plans to invest in fabric and other supplies to make and sell pants, shirts, and multipurpose clothing in the shops in Barranquilla. His challenge is expanding his workshop with new machines, hiring workers that allow him to have more income and, in the future, remodeling his house.

loans.use: to repair two of his machines and invest in fabric and other supplies to make and sell pants, shirts, and multipurpose clothing in the shops in Barranquilla.

loans.name: Scovia

texts.en: Scovia is a 35-year-old, single female with five children, four of whom are attending school.  She deals in the business of selling cassava flour. She is faced with the challenge of market competition. Scovia started her business so she could look after herself and her family. She describes herself as being an honest and hard-working woman. She is requesting a loan to buy cassava flour for selling.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Maria Luzmila

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 57 años de edad, soltera y vive sola. 
Actualmente se gana la vida con la venta de mercancía por como productos de uso personal; esta actividad la inició gracias al apoyo de un familiar, con este negocio ha logrado obtener ingresos para su sustento. 

Es una persona emprendedora y luchadora, con ganas de salir adelante para seguir con su negocio. 

Este crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar desea invertirlo en la compra de surtido de mercancía como cremas, lociones, desodorantes, entre otros, al por mayor con el fin de tener la oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas ofreciendo mayor variedad de productos que satisfagan los diversos gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes que principalmente son amigos y vecinos. 

Su principal sueño es tener gran cantidad de surtido y ampliar la cartera con los clientes buenos y aumentar sus ventas, así podrá tener un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Maria is a 57-year-old woman who is single and lives alone.

Currently, she earns her living by selling merchandise such as personal use products. She began this work thanks to the support of a family member. With this business, she has managed to get income to support herself. 

She is an enterprising and determined woman, with desires to get ahead to continue with her business.

She wants to invest this loan that she is requesting from Corporación Interactuar in purchasing an assortment of merchandise such as creams, lotions, deodorants, and more, in bulk, with the end of having the opportunity to increase her sales, offering a greater variety of products that satisfy the diverse tastes and needs of her customers who primarily are her friends and neighbors.

Her primary dream is to have a large quantity of stock and expand her customer base with good customers and increase her sales, so that she has a better living.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of merchandise such as creams, lotions, deodorants, and others, in bulk.

loans.name: Janneth Amparo

texts.es:
Janneth es propietaria de una fábrica de arepas, tiene de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposo y 2 hijos que dependen únicamente de este negocio para poder sobrevivir, comer, pagar sus deudas etc. 

Su negocio viene operando desde febrero de 2010 el cual alterna con unas confecciones y ahora quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra insumos como maíz y queso, ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Este crédito le permitirá continuar con la venta de comidas y seguir manteniéndose en el mercado, pues es quien genera los mayores ingresos en su hogar. 

Su sueño es poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda a través de su trabajo duro.
texts.en:
Janneth is the owner of an arepa [typical Colombian flat bread] factory. She is 43 years old, and lives with her husband and 2 children who depend solely on this business to be able to survive, eat, pay their debts, etc. 

Her business has been operating since February 2010, which she alternates with making clothing, and now she wants to ask for a loan to purchase supplies such as corn and cheese, ingredients to make her foods.

This loan will allow her to continue with her sales of food and continue in the market, since she is the one who earns the most in her household.

Her dream is to be able to improve her housing conditions through hard work.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as corn and cheese, ingredients to make her food.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo, de 72 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y por las tardes vende pupusas y tiene cuatro hijos todos son mayores de edad.

Eduardo, es empleado en el ministerio de gobernación desde hace diez años y su horario de 
trabajo es de 8:00 a.m. a 3:30 p.m.
 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una plancha para la elaboración de pupusas, porque la que tiene ya no le sirve.

El sueño de Eduardo, es que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 72 years old. He went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and his wife does housework and sells pupusas in the afternoon. He has four children, all of them grown. 

Eduardo has been an employee for the Ministry of Governance for ten years and his work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m.
 
He needs a loan to buy a press to make pupusas, because the one he has doesn't work any more.

Eduardo's dream is for his children to be educated and graduate from college.

loans.use: to buy a press to make pupusas.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
RUKHSANA is a 51-year-old married mother of four children, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She owns a small business selling ladies' ready-made garments from home. She purchases cloth from the market at a low price, sews it and sells it for higher prices in her community. The ladies of town like her garment collection and selection a lot. The demand for clothes has increased because of upcoming religious festival of Muslims (Eid-Ul-Adha); this is the reason  people are demanding charming clothes. Her husband meets all the household expenses from his earnings and she contributes her earnings only for savings. 
She has requested a loan so that she can buy more varieties of cloth to fulfill the demand. RUKHSANA wishes for the bright future of her children. She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cloth to fulfill the increasing demand.

loans.name: Solidario María Del Rosario Group

texts.es: Solidario María del Rosario La encargada de este grupo es la señora Brenda quien tiene una tortillería desde hace 10 años y está ubicada en la calle principal del pueblo. Su sueño es seguir creciendo y tener un lugar más grande y ayudar a otras mujeres que necesitan un empleo. Sus hijos le ayudan en el negocio vendiendo papas fritas y está muy contenta. Ella tiene mucha demanda de tortillas pero le hace falta comprar más quintales de maíz por tal motivo necesita un préstamo para no quedarles mal a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The head of the community bank group Solidario Maria del Rosario is Brenda, who has been making tortillas for the past 10 years and is located on the main street of the town. 

Her dream is to continue growing, to have a larger place, and to help other women who need employment. 

Her children help her in the business selling potato chips and she is very happy. Her tortillas are very popular, but she lacks the ability to purchase more bags of 100 pounds of corn and for this reason needs a loan to keep up with her customers.

loans.use: to purchase corn for making tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo desde hace 10 años, vende sus productos agrícolas en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el joven vive en casa propia con su madre, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, insecticidas, fertilizantes, etc. y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida junto con su madre.
texts.en:
The young man's face has been pixelated because he is 24 years old and lives in a high risk zone. He makes a living farming corn, beans, and sorghum and has done so for 10 years. He sells his agricultural products in different markets that can be found close to his home. The young man lives in his own house with his mother. 

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc. and with this obtain better economic income for a better quality of life together with his mother.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Dúo Estela De San Pedro Group

texts.es: Dúo Estela de San Pedro La encargada de este grupo es doña Estela quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos en general, medicina natural, chamarras, sabanas, cubrecamas, sandalias desde hace 10 años, es vendedora ambulante y su sueño es tener un local lleno de productos y no caminar más para vender. Tiene varios pedidos de cosméticos y medicina natural que entregar pero no le alcanza el dinero que tiene por ello necesita otro préstamo y entregar sus pedidos.
texts.en: The Estela de San Pedro duo is run by Estela who has worked selling general cosmetics, natural medicine, jackets, sheets, bedspreads, and sandals for the past 10 years. She is a street vendor and her dream is to have a retail space filled with products and not to walk any more to sell. She has a variety of orders for cosmetics and natural medicines to deliver but she doesn't have enough money and, for this, she needs another loan to deliver her orders.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Basilia De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Basilia de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de pollos de engorde, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda encementando el piso y reforzando el techo, pero como no posee de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, polines, pago de mano de obra entre otros materiales y asi ella y su familia puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Basilia is 51 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and daughter. She makes a living in agriculture and raising fattening chickens, and with her work’s earnings she is able to contribute to the household expenses.

She wants to improve her house by cementing the floor and reinforcing the ceiling, but since she does not have enough savings, she is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, and beams, and to pay for labor. With this, she and her family will be able to live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and beams, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Thèm

texts.en:
Thèm lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
Her household was recognized by the local government as poor and her job is unstable.. She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years.
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.
In 2013, Thèm joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Thèm has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
Thèm hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Ca

texts.en:
Mrs Ca is 55 years old and she is married.  She has had a retail business selling dry foods for more than 10 years. Ca lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa Province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profits, Ca hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine.

loans.name: Bình

texts.en:
Mrs Bình is 32 years old and she is married. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years. Bình lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village.  Moreover, the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
This is Bình's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  With her business profit, Bình hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase clean water filter machine

loans.name: Ninh

texts.en:
Mrs Ninh is 48 years old and she is married.  She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years.  Ninh lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in village.  Moreover, the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.
This is Ninh's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Ninh hopes to buy a motorbike, to see her family healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase clean water filter machine

loans.name: Thuận

texts.en:
Mrs Thuận is 38 years old and she is married.  She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years.  Thuận lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in village.  Moreover, the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
This is Thuận's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Thuận hopes to buy a motorbike, to see her family healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase clean water filter machine

loans.name: Hiệu

texts.en:
Hiệu is 44 years old and married.

She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry for more than 10 years.

Hiệu lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province.
Her family is a low-income household in the village. The market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns Hiệu is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a water filter machine to produce clean water.

In 2013, Hiệu joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Hiệu has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Hiệu hopes to maintain a successful business so her family can be healthy and happy, and so that she can make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase a water filter machine.

loans.name: Khánh

texts.en:
Khánh is 52 years old and married.
She has operated a food stall/restaurant, selling fish for more than 10 years.
Khánh lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.
She is from a low-income household in village where the business market is limited in the region. 
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
This is Khánh first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
Khánh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Brenilda

texts.es:
Brenilda tiene 33 años de edad,conviviente,con 4 hijos, vive en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Brenilda se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como cuyes, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Brenilda espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Brenilda is 32 years old, has 4 children and lives with her family in the rural area of the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, north coast of Peru. The main economic activities in her community are agriculture, cattle raising and commerce. 

Brenilda works raising and selling animals, such as guinea pigs, chickens, ducks, turkeys, and others. She has more than 10 years of experience in this business, which is located at her home, and she has good personal and professional references in the area. 

She will use this loan to buy a larger quantity of animals such as guinea pigs, ducks, turkeys, and chickens, among others, and also to buy nutritious feed for them. With this Brenda hopes to offer a better product to her customers, enabling her to generate greater income, ultimately improving her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals such as guinea pigs, ducks, turkeys, and chickens, among others, and also to buy nutritious feed for them.

loans.name: Trình

texts.en:
Mrs Trình is 51 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. Trình lives in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in village.  Moreover, the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine .
In 2013, Trình joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Trình has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Trình hopes to travel for vacation within the country, to see her family healthy and happy, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase clean water filter machine

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su menor hija en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Mateo se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 20 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Mateo espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mateo is 43 years old and lives with his younger daughter in Pucará district, which is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this community is peaceful, the people work primarily in commerce and raising small livestock. 

Mateo works offering transportation to passengers in his vehicle (a motorcycle taxi), work that he has done for over 20 years. He has experience in the field and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan will be used to do some repairs and maintenance to his vehicle which is currently in bad condition. With this, Mateo hopes to offer better services to his customers which will generate more income, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to do repairs and maintenance to his vehicle.

loans.name: Ludgena

texts.en:
Ludgena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years and earns more income from selling ready-to-wear clothing.

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional box of fish to sell through her fish vending business.

Ludgena has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Her dream is to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional box of fish to sell

loans.name: Regalada

texts.en:
Regalada is a 64-year-old married mother of two children, one in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Regalada has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. Regalada requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials and gear for her business.

Regalada has been in this business for five years. Regalada would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gear for her business

loans.name: Ronna Mae

texts.en:
Ronna Mae is 31 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. 

Ronna Mae has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for eight years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. Ronna Mae would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Diana Margarita

texts.es:
Diana es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.
Diana es madre soltera y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender ropa, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Diana tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de camisetas, jeans, calzado, entre otros.

Le dedica 5 horas diarias a su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Diana is a very hard-working person who, thanks to her daily efforts, has managed to get her children ahead, offering them a good quality education. Diana is a single mother and a long time ago, she began to sell clothing. With a lot of effort, she has overcome many problems that have come up. 

Currently, Diana has some very good orders from her customers and due to not having a lot of capital, she asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of shirts, jeans, shoes, and more.

She works 5 hours each day at her business.

Her greatest dream is to get ahead with her business and from there be able to offer her children a good quality of life and better economic stability. She knows that with Interactuar's hand she will be able to achieve it.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of shirts, jeans, shoes and more.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a 40-year-old married woman with two children, who are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Rosalie has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. Rosalie has been in this business for 10 years. Rosalie requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

In the future, Rosalie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is 57 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.  Teodora is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Teodora requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Teodora has been raising livestock for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Teodora would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Marlled Del Socorro

texts.es:
Marlled, a sus 49 años de edad, es una mujer carismática, activa y servicial. Ser madre de una hija, fue el principal motivo para luchar incansablemente día a día, buscando alternativas para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar. 
Desde hace aproximadamente 20 años, comenzó a comercializar mercancía de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, lo que le permitió darse a conocer en el sector y lograr una buena trayectoria. 
Trabaja todos los días durante 9 horas.

Esto la impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer sus inventarios, pues comprará acolchados, ropa y artículos par el hogar al por mayor, así podrá satisfacer la demanda que aumenta, esto le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. 

Marlled manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir haciendo lo que le apasiona, por ello siempre se propone nuevas metas y entre ellas está el de convertirse en una gran distribuidora de mercancía y generar oportunidades de empleo, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Anímate a prestar al negocio de Marlled!
texts.en:
Marlled at 49 years old, is a charismatic, active and attentive woman. Being the mother of a daughter was her main motive for fighting tirelessly day to day, seeking alternatives to earn a living and support her home. 
 
Approximately 20 years ago, she started to sell merchandise of a very high quality at excellent prices. This allowed her to know the area and have a good business trajectory. She works 9 hours every day. 

This is what is driving her to ask for the help of a loan to fortify her inventory. She will buy comforters, clothing and household items. She will be able to meet increasing demand. This will help her to improve the income she earns from her work. 

Marlled says that her age doesn't stop her from continuing to do what she is passionate about. That is why she is always setting new goals and among them is becoming a great merchandise distributor and generate employment opportunities. This way, she can improve the quality of life of her whole family.  

We encourage you to make a loan to Marlled's business!

loans.use: to buy comforters, clothing and household items wholesale to meet increasing demand.

loans.name: Magdalena De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Magdalena es una joven ecuatoriana que nació en la cuidad de Latacunga perteneciente a la provincia de Cotopaxi, vive en un sector rural de la cuidad llamado Culaguango Bajo, este sector se caracteriza por tener un clima frio con gente humilde y amable que tradicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales lo que les permite mejorar su ingresos económicos. Magdalena es soltera pero vive en unión libre con Marco un hombre trabajador que ha sido su apoyo incondicional durante su vida con quien tiene un hijo. Gracias al esfuerzo y apoyo de su padres termino sus estudios secundarios.
Magdalena se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos blancos, oficio  que lo aprendió de su madre, este el medio por el cual aporta económicamente a su familia dándoles todo lo que necesitan. Solicita su crédito para incrementar su negocio y de esta forma mejorar el valor de sus ingresos y la calidad de vida su familia. Magdalena agradece a KIVA y a Fundación Alternativa por ayudarle a cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Magdalena is a young Ecuadorian woman who was born in the city of Latacunga, which belongs to the province of Cotopaxi. She lives in the rural part of the city called Culaguango Bajo. This region is characterized by its cold climate as well as its modest and lovable people, who traditionally have been working in animal breeding. This commercial activity is what allows the people to improve their economic income. 

Magdalena is single but lives in a common law marriage with Marco, a hard-working man who has been her unconditional support throughout her life. She has a son with him. She finished her secondary school studies thanks to the effort and the support of her parents.

Magdalena works in the breeding and sales of white pigs, a trade that she learned from her mother. Through this work she contributes economically to her family, giving them all that they need. 

She is requesting a loan to expand her business and by doing so, to improve the value of her income and the quality of her family's life. Magdalena is grateful to Kiva and to Fundación Alternativa for helping her achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to expand her business by purchasing more pigs, and to improve her quality of life by doing so

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre muy trabajador y organizado, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de transporte de personas en su vehículo a través de las veredas del municipio de Frontino posibilitando el desplazamiento de la comunidad hasta las distintas áreas del municipio.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es casado y es padre de dos hijos.
Solicita un préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento y reparación a su carro ya que es su único medio de trabajo.
Con este crédito podrá mejorar las condiciones de su vehículo y podrá continuar prestando su servicio con total seguridad y sin poner en riesgo su vida ni la de sus clientes.
Apoya a Juan con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Juan is a very hardworking and organized man, who makes a living providing transportation services in his vehicle on Frontino's municipal roads and makes it possible for community residents to travel to all of the municipality's various areas.

He's a friendly, helpful, and very enterprising man who's married and has two children. He's applying for a loan to do maintenance and repairs on his car since it's his only means of work. With this loan he'll be able to improve the condition of his vehicle and be able to continue providing services in complete safety and without putting he and his passengers' lives at risk.
