Support Juan with this loan today!

loans.use: To do maintenance and repairs on his car, since it's his only means of work.

loans.name: Manuel Ovidio

texts.es: Manuel tiene 30 años de edad es soltero y tiene una hija de 3 años pertenece a la Ventanilla Mushuc Pakari, el se dedica a la agricultura y a la compra de animales, solicita el crédito para la comprar una vaca para aumentar a las que ya tiene para una mayor producción de queso, gracias a este crédito podra mejorar la calidad de vida y mejorar su economia, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es las enfermedades y en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Manuel is 30 years old, single, and has a 3-year-old daughter. He belongs to the rural service window of Mushuc Pakari. He works in agriculture and in purchasing animals. He asks for the loan to purchase a cow to increase the number he has to have more cheese production. Thanks to this loan, he will be able to improve his quality of life and improve his economic status. The challenges he confronts are diseases and in his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a 54 year-old, widow with four children. She operates a sari-sari store business. She is in her 5th loan cycle, asking for a loan of Php 20,000 to buy variety of commodities. 

Catherine is thankful for the help given.

loans.use: to buy variety of commodities

loans.name: Santos Luciano

texts.es:
Santos, de 33 años de edad, es un campesino trabajador con deseos de superación, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y también hace petates, tiene tres hijos pero solo dos están estudiando. 

Santos, realiza trabajos agrícolas, así como también trabaja para personas particulares prestando sus servicios para generar ingresos para el sustento diario de su familia; se dedica a estas actividades desde hace más de 17 años, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a una escuela, debido a sus escasos de recursos económicos y fue así como decidió dedicarse al trabajo agrícola.

Santos, necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de maíz y para pagar mano de obra.

Los sueños de Santos son, ver su parcela bien cargada de frutos y que sus hijos se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
Santos, 33 years old, is a hard-working farmer with desires to improve himself. He is partnered and his partner takes care of the household tasks and also makes woven mats. He has three children, but only two are in school. 

Santos does agricultural work, and also works for other people, offering his services to generate income to support his family. He has done this work for more than 17 years. He didn't have the opportunity to go to school due to their limited economic resources and it was in this way that he decided to work in agriculture.

Santos needs the loan to purchase fertilizer for his corn crop and to pay labor costs.

Santos's dreams are to see his plot of land full of fruit and that his children get an education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his corn crop and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Carolina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carolina, de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno, es madre soltera de un hijo y actualmente vive con su tía porque sus padres fallecieron cuando ella era una niña.


Carolina, desde muy joven ha trabajado fuerte, antes salía a vender frutas y verduras en la comunidad y con esos ingresos han podido salir adelanté; hace un tiempo se les otorgo un crédito para comprar un plancha para hacer pupusas, dicho negocio fue establecido y fue muy rentable y gracias a su esfuerzo pagaron el crédito sin problemas.

Ahora Carolina, necesita otro crédito para construir una champa para poder vender las pupusas sin tener que mojarse en invierno.

Los sueños de Carolina son, tener un hogar propio donde pueda vivir con su propia familia cuando se case y expandir su negocio para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Carolina, 23 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade. She is a single mother with one child and currently lives with her aunt because her parents died when she was a girl.

Carolina, since she was very young, has worked hard. Before, she went out to sell fruits and vegetables in the community and with this income she has been able to get ahead. Some time ago, she got a loan to purchase a griddle to make pupusas. This business was established and it was very profitable and, thanks to her efforts, she paid off her loan without any problems. 

Now Carolina needs another loan to build a shed to be able to sell the pupusas without having to get wet in the winter.

Carolina's dreams are to have her own house where she can live with her own family when she gets married, and to expand her business to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a shed to be able to sell her pupusas without getting wet in the winter.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 50 year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her one son and four daughters. 

Her husband has been running his own business of clothes selling for 15 years.  He is the only one responsible to feed the entire family and manage the household. Her husband needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purposes, but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase these clothes. Therefore Nasreen is applying for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can assist her husband to purchase these clothes in bulk for his business. Her husband can also increase the size of his business and earn maximum profit with the help of this loan amount. 

Nasreen is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase different types of clothes in bulk

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Kousar is a 40 year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her two sons.  Her children are studying.  Her husband has been running his own business of clothes selling for five years and he is the only one responsible to feed the entire family and manage the house hold. Her husband needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purposes.  

Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to purchase these clothes. Therefore, Kousar is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can assist her husband to purchase these clothes in bulk for his business. Her husband can also increase the size of his business and earn maximum profit with the help of this loan amount. 

Kousar is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: purchase different types of clothes.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Gloria is able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales, these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities, like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. She tried her luck and borrowed a loan to jump start her vegetable production. She plants a variety of vegetables. After several months, she was able to return her borrowed capital. To this day, Norma feels she owes her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her vegetable production business. 

Recently, she took a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season. Norma wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply high quality vegetables in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

location.town: SINDANGAN - LAGAG, SINDANGAN, ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Llegunas

texts.en: Llegunas is a mother of four children and has had a motor shop business for the past three years. Her business involves motors for hire or public transport. She does this work to support her children. She asked for a loan to purchase another motor unit. Owning another one will increase her income and would be able to support the needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase another motor unit

loans.name: Torberita

texts.en:
Torberita learned from her neighbors that Paglaum MPC offers financial assistance to start-up businesses. As a farmer in Poblacion, Siayan, she tried her luck and borrowed a loan to jump start her gardening. To this day, Torberita feels she owes her good life to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her gardening business.

Recently she took a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season. Torberita wishes to yield more produce to sustain her gardening business.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Pedro Francisco

texts.es:
Pedro, ha sabido aprovechar la oportunidad de invertir créditos en su imprenta, actualmente tienen su equipo de trabajo en buenas condiciones y ha respondido positivamente a los encargos que hacen sus clientes, las condiciones de vida familiar son más confortables.
Está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para invertirlo en tintas y papelería, también piensa en darle mantenimiento a su equipo de trabajo, con ello continuara desarrollando sus activadas y considera que le será más fácil atender los pedidos que hacen sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pedro has taken full advantage of the opportunity to invest loans in his printing press. Currently the equipment is in good condition and has responded positively to the orders made by their customers. Family living conditions are more comfortable. 

He is requesting a loan again to invest in dyes, stationary, and is also thinking of equipment maintenance. With this he will continue developing his work and knows that it will be easier to attend to his customers orders.

loans.use: to invest in dyes and stationary, he is also thinking of equipment maintenance.

loans.name: Yaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yaneth, con 43 años de edad es madre de 3 hijos y es casada.

Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía en su almacén, ofrece cosméticos, accesorios, ropa, perfumes, entre otros y con esto ha logrado obtener recursos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar durante los 9 años que lleva realizando dicha actividad. 

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, dedicada y comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, siempre busca oportunidades que le permitan progresar, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor como accesorios, papelería, entre otros para aprovechar los descuentos que le realizan y ofrecer más variedad que satisfaga los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y así poder tener mejor margen de utilidad por las ventas. 

De esta manera, Yaneth podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su objetivo primordial, que es ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, brindándoles una estabilidad económica favorable para darles la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Yaneth is 43 years of age, a mother of three children and married.

She currently sells goods for a living in her store. She offers cosmetics, accessories, clothing, perfumes, and more. Through this business, she has managed to obtain the means to contribute to the maintenance of her home during the nine years she has been doing it.

She is an enterprising woman with vision, dedicated and committed to her family and to her work. Yaneth is always looking for opportunities that will allow her to develop, which is why she is requesting this loan with the intent to invest it in the purchase of wholesale goods like accessories, stationery, and more. This is to take advantage of the available discounts and offer more variety in order to meet the needs and tastes of her customers. By doing this, she will be able to have a greater profit margin on her sales.

In this way, Yaneth will be able to advance toward the accomplishment of her primary goal, which is to expand her business and improve her children’s quality of life, providing them with the financial stability ideal for giving them the best possible education.

loans.use: buy wholesale goods like accessories, stationery, and more in order to take advantage of the discounts and offer more variety.

loans.name: Sabita

texts.en:
Sabita is a 28-year-old young and energetic rural housewife. She lives in Alipurduar district of West Bengal with her husband and two daughters. Both of her daughters are students. Sabita has attended school up to grade eight and was deprived of further education due to financial issues of her family.

Her husband Raju has been associated with clothing sales for years. Though being a housewife, Sabita helps her husband in this business. They purchase mainly saris from the wholesale dealers and sell them in the local town market. According to festivals and occasions, they also sell frocks, salwar suits, and many others as per the customers’ demand.

Sabita sells saris (a traditional Indian dress for women in India) to the local rural people, neighbors, relatives, and friends. Together, the couple has been working hard to earn their livelihood, since this is their sole source of income. They earn barely enough to cover all the household expenses. To increase the stock of clothing, the couple needs capital to buy high-quality varieties of clothing. For this reason, Sabita has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

She hopes the loan amount will help her to buy more stock of varieties clothing for sale, which will take care of her financial expenses for the rest of the year. Her main desire is to expand the business with the outcome profit for building a concrete house for her family.

Sabita is thanking her lenders.

loans.use: to increase the stock of clothing for her family-run business.

loans.name: Horacio De Jesus

texts.es:
Horacio es un hombre de 66 años de edad fuerte, trabajador, humilde y servicial lleva trabajando en su finca gran parte de su vida y todos sus conocimientos los aprendió gracias a su familia que realizan actividades similares. 

Padre de un hijo menor de edad el cual quiere educar con las buenas costumbres del campo pero tratando de que pueda acceder a una buena educación y no le toque un trabajo tan pesado para sobrevivir pues no cualquier persona ejerce esta profesión. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de abonos, riegos y semillas de café buscando mejorar y aumentar su producción de cultivos, pues es soñador y piensa es darle a su hijo todas las herramientas para forjarle un excelente futuro
texts.en:
Horacio is a 66-year-old man, strong, hard-working, humble and helpful. He has been working his farm for a large part of his life and all of his knowledge he learned thanks to his family who does similar work.

He is the father of a young son who he wants to educate with good rural customs, but trying to have him be able to access a good education so he doesn't have to do such heavy work to survive since not not just anyone does this work. 

He asks for a loan to purchase manure, coffee seeds and pay for irrigation, seeking to improve and expand his crop production, since he is a visionary and thinks to give his son all the tools to forge an excellent future.

loans.use: to purchase manure, coffee seeds, and pay for irrigation, seeking to improve and expand his crop production.

loans.name: Jose Robeiro

texts.es:
Un pequeño impulso y ayuda es lo que necesita el señor José para incentivar y mejorar sus cultivos de café.

José que es un hombre soltero de 42 años de edad, soltero y sin familia que heredo el negocio de sus padres quienes le enseñaron todo acerca del cultivo, busca tu ayuda debido a que los insumos agrícolas tiene un costo muy elevado que en muchas ocasiones agricultores no pueden asumir, en gran medida porque los cogen en tiempo de maduración del producto y en ese lapso de tiempo dejan de recibir ingresos.

Su meta es mantener y expandir sus terrenos de cultivo y espera poder encontrar una pareja, para tener un hijo(a) para que continúe con el negocio familiar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, mano de obra para echar los fertilizantes, insecticidas y bolsas para empacar el producto.
texts.en:
A small push and some help is what José needs to incentivize and improve his coffee crops.

José is a single, 42 year old man. He doesn't have a family. He inherited the business from his parents, who taught him everything about growing. He is seeking your help because agricultural materials have very high costs that most farmers can't pay, mostly because they are incurred when the product is growing and during that time they have no income.

His goal is to maintain and expand his cropland and he hopes to find a spouse to have a child to continue with the family business.

The money will be invested in buying seeds, materials, insecticides, bags to pack the product, and fertilizer, as well as to pay for labor to spread the fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy seeds, materials, insecticide, bags to pack the product and fertilizer, as well as to pay for the labor to spread the fertilizer.

loans.name: Natalia Andrea

texts.es:
Natalia, una madre de 33 años de edad con 1 hijo a su cuidado de 6 años, es madre cabeza de hogar y ha podido sostener a su hijo gracias a que trabaja como productora agropecuaria en la finca de sus padres. 

Solicita un crédito para iniciar su propio negocio, una pequeña empresa de producción de cerdos, los cuales criara y alimentara para posteriormente venderlos, la iniciativa la tomo básicamente por su hijo, porque quiere disfrutar con el de una mejor vida, que estudie y que todos los días tengan un motivo para sonreír.

El dinero será invertido en cerdos de levante y materiales para la construcción de un corral para albergarlos. 

Con un préstamo puedes ayudar a una mujer colombiana a salir adelante con su hijo!
texts.en:
Natalia, a 33-year-old woman with 1 child in her care, who is 6, is a female head of household and has been able to support her son with her work as an agricultural producer on her parents' farm. 

She asks for a loan to begin her own business, a small pig-producing business. She will raise and feed them, to later sell them. She basically took this initiative for her son, because she wants to enjoy a better life with him, for him to go to school and that every day they have a reason to smile.

The money will be invested in pigs to raise and materials to build a corral to house them.

With a loan you can help a Colombian woman get ahead with her son!

loans.use: to purchase pigs to raise and materials to build a corral to house them.

loans.name: Inmaculada Concepcion De Qosqo Ayllu Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INMACULADA CONCEPCION DE QOSQO AYLLU”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San Salvador, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cesaria ella es casada y tiene 44 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio negocio de crianza de cuyes, la socia los cuyes los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y alimentos para los cuyes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de ganaderia.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members make up the community bank “INMACULADA CONCEPCION DE QOSQO AYLLU”. This is located in the district of San Salvador, in the province of Calca and the department of Cusco.  

This member is Cesaria. She is married, 44 years old and has 3 children. She works in her business of raising guinea pigs. She raises and fattens the guinea pigs and then sells them in various markets. She has been in this business for several years and it has been going very well. Cesaria's dream is to have a location where she can sell the guinea pigs. She is requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs and food for them. 

The other members have businesses selling animals, farming businesses, a business selling groceries and a ranching business.

Cersaria is grateful for those who form a part of this dream through this means and promises to make the payments by the set deadlines.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and food for guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy motor oil and a spare tire and to pay for repair and maintenance

loans.name: Willyn

texts.en:
Willyn is a businesswoman from Lagag, Sindangan. She is 26 years old, married, and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Willyn is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default.

Now she applied for a loan to restock the store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Willyn continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

location.town: SINDANGAN - LAGAG, SINDANGAN, ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Adjelyn

texts.en:
Adjelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Adjelyn has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from raising pigs.

Adjelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Her dream is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Welly

texts.en:
Welly is 57 years old and married with nine children. She earns a living by running a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Welly is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Welly has been in pig fattening for two years and earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream: to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Gilma Rosa

texts.es:
Gilma es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Medellín desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Gilma y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Gilma desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más eficiente, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, jamon, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Gilma is a humble, hardworking woman who has put much of her life into taking care of her children. She lives in the municipality of Medellin where she performs spectacularly in the kitchen, since her business is preparing food to order such as tamales, sausages, empanadas, crepes, and more.

She sells these meals mainly to area residents who are familiar with Gilma's cooking and know they can always get delicious, well-made food.

Gilma wants to increase her food sales and work more efficiently, and for this reason has applied for a loan to purchase ingredients to continue preparing her recipes such as chickens, flour, cheese, ham, and more.

This loan will enable her to keep her business going so that she can obtain the income necessary to have the opportunity  to keep supporting her family, an opportunity that Corporacion Interactuar has given her.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients to continue preparing her recipes, such as chickens, flour, cheese, ham, and more.

loans.name: Hede

texts.en:
Hede is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

She has been in this business for 10 years and earns more income from food vending.

Hede has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Her dream is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo, un campesino muy amoroso y de gran pasión por la naturaleza, trabaja con animales, pero no sacrificándolos ni vendiéndolos solamente sino que trabaja con la leche de sus vacas; es tanta la admiración y respeto por estos animales que prefiere que mueran por vejez antes de tener que sacrificarles para conseguir una rentabilidad por su carne. 

Pensando en su vivienda y en familia, quiere expandirse, por tal motivo tiene un dinero juntado para comprar vacas lecheras, por lo que requiere un crédito para ajustar el total del dinero para la compra de dichos animales. 

Con la ayuda de este préstamo tendrá más producción lechera garantizando una vida económica estable para el futuro. 

Sueña con tener una finca con mucho ganado rodearse de estos mamíferos que le ayudan a llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Eduardo, a very loving rural person with a great passion for nature, works with animals, but not killing them or selling them, he just works with the milk from his cows. Such is his admiration and respect for these animals that he prefers they die of old age rather than having to kill them to get profit for their meat.

Thinking of his house and family, he wants to expand, so he has gathered money to purchase dairy cow, for which he needs a loan to make up the difference to purchase these animals.

With the help of this loan, he will have more dairy production, guaranteeing a life with economic stability in the future.

He dreams of having a farm with many cows to surround himself with these mammals that help him to bring sustenance to his family.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows for his farm.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz Dary es una mujer soltera, trabajadora, emprendedora, una mujer nunca sintió empatía por trabajar para otra persona, por ello busco los medios para montar su propio negocio y gracias a su perseverancia y ahorros monto un cibercafé.

Inicio su negocio por necesidad económica, de una manera empírica, compro los equipos y programas y conforme iba pasando el tiempo le ha añadido diferentes servicios extras a su negocio como lo son las fotocopias, impresiones y venta de artículos de papelería.

Luz Dary quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de artículos de oficina y realizar reparación y mantenimiento a sus equipos de cómputo, le gusta que sus clientes gocen de equipos agiles y en con el menor número de virus posibles.
texts.en:
Luz Dary is a single woman, hard-working and entrepreneurial.  She is a woman who never felt the desire to work for another person, and for this reason she looked for ways to start her own business.  Thanks to her perseverance and savings, she started a cybercafe.

She began her business for economic reasons and, in a practical way, she bought the equipment and programs.  As time has gone on, she has added different extra services to her business, such as photocopying, printing and selling stationery items.

Luz Dary is requesting a loan to buy office items and to do repairs and maintenance on her computer equipment.  She likes her clients to enjoy equipment that works well with the least number of viruses possible.

loans.use: to buy office items and to do repairs and maintenance on her computer equipment

loans.name: Alishba

texts.en:
Alishba is a 36-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and four children. Her husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market for seven years.  He is the only one responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family. Alishba's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories e.g. pieces of cloth, laces, needles and sewing machine accessories, but due to some financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable condition to buy these items for his business purposes. 

Therefore, Alishba has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount she will financially assist her husband to the above tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs, so that he can earn a more profitable income. For this financial assistance Alishba is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband to increase his tailoring business.

loans.name: Maria Oliva

texts.es:
La señora Maria desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando una vaca lechera que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es madre responsable y amorosa con su hijo, vive en una finca con el y su esposo quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarle a su hijo una educación de calidad para que más adelante se pueda defender solo y sea independiente.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Since she was very young, Maria has worked in rural jobs such as agriculture and raising animals, work that her father taught her in order to get ahead in her life.

These days, her primary work is agriculture and raising animals. She has as her goal to improve her capital, purchasing a dairy cow which will allow her to be supplied and generate more income, and this is the reason she is asking for a loan. 

She is a responsible and loving mother to her son. She lives on a farm with him and her husband who has been her greatest companion.

She dreams of being able to offer her son a quality education so that in the future he can take care of himself and be independent.

Every day, she tends her business and tries to do the things very well and she knows that with Corporación Interactuar's help, she will be able to go far.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow which will allow her to be supplied and have more income.

loans.name: Jose Rodrigo

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 35 años de edad, vive con su pareja y se dedica al transporte de personas en la zona de San Carlos.

José ha logrado consolidarse y diferenciarse de los competidores gracias a su buen servicio y seguridad que ofrece a sus clientes. La mentalidad de cuidar a su pasajero por encima de un beneficio propio lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo el cual quiere invertir en realizar un mantenimiento preventivo a su moto, anillarla, revisar suspensión y un cambio de llantas.

Para José este préstamo será muy importante ya que generara en sus clientes confianza y la certeza de que por parte de la moto y el conductor llegaran sanos y salvos a sus hogares.
texts.en:
José is 35 years old and lives with his partner. He works transporting people in the San Carlos area. Jose has been able to strengthen his business and differentiate himself from his competitors thanks to his good service and the security he offers his customers. 

The set of mind of looking after his passengers over personal gain leads him to request a loan. He wants to invest the loan in preventative maintenance for his motorbike: banding, checking the suspension, and changing the tires. 

This is a very important loan for José because he generates confidence in his clients and the certainty that, because of the motorbike and the driver, they will arrive safely at their home.

loans.use: to perform preventative maintenance on his motorbike: banding, checking the suspension, and changing the tires.

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
Jose Miguel tiene 27 años de edad,conviviente, junto a su cónyugue y sus tres menores hijos viven en una zona rural en el caserío La Conga, del distrito de Callayuc que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Jose Miguel se dedica a la crianza y venta ganado vacuno, entre otros; además tiene una bodega, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 8 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado vacuno, así como para la compra de fertilizantes para los pastizales. Con esto Jose Miguel espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Miguel is 27 years old. He lives with his spouse and his three children in a rural area of the village of La Conga, in Callayuc district which is located in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. The inhabitants of this district work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Jose Miguel works raising and selling cattle, amongst others. He also has a store that is located in his house. He has eight years experience in the business and has good personal and labor references from the area. The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy a greater quantity of cattle as well as fertilizer for his pastureland. Doing this Jose Miguel hopes to offer a better product to his clients which will allow him to generate higher income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of cattle as well as fertilizer for his pastureland.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
Jose, ha iniciado a preparar la tierra para sembrar y está necesitando de un nuevo crédito para comprar insecticidas, herbicidas, abono y semilla de maíz, con dichos materiales su cultivo de granos básicos y hortalizas tendrá un buen desarrollo, espera que el clima sea favorable para lograr una cosecha abundante y así mantener su fuente de ingresos.
Con la ayuda del préstamo anterior ha tenido granos en abundancia para la alimentación familiar y para comercializar, sus nuevos ingresos están siendo utilizados para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Jose has started to prepare the land for planting and needs a new loan to buy insecticides, herbicides, manure, and corn seed.  With these supplies, his plantings of basic grains and vegetables will grow well.  He hopes that the weather will be favorable for getting an abundant harvest, and in this way he can maintain his source of income.

With the help of his previous loan he has grains in abundance for feeding his family and for selling.  His new income is being used to cover the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, herbicides, manure, and corn seed so that his plantings of basic grains and vegetables grow well.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca lives in Ermera and is a businesswoman. She is applying for a loan of $600.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She has a shop selling clothes in the market. She is taking this loan because she wants to buy more clothes such as shirts, trousers, turtlenecks, long sleeves, short sleeves and other clothes to sell.

Francisca started her business in 2013 with her working capital of $500.00. She is earning a good income every day because she is selling in the center of the market, so many people are able to find clothes that interest them in her shop. And with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she hopes that she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy shirts, trousers, turtlenecks, long sleeves, short sleeves and other clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ricardo Catalino

texts.es:
Catalino, junto a su esposa ha podido formar una unidad familiar y productiva bastante fuerte, ya que no solo prima el amor si no también los deseos de salir adelante y progresar como familia.

El se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos de levante, es una actividad aprendida empíricamente.

El pide un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Es un hombre soñador y con gran voluntad, tanto así que ya piensa en grande y desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad.

Tiene gran ilusión y expectativa con este proyecto y confía en el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para crecer como empresario.

En tus manos esta que el negocio de Catalino prospere en el tiempo, Anímate!
texts.en:
Catalino, along with his wife, has been able to form a strong family and productive unit since not only do they prioritize love, but also the desire to get ahead and progress as a family. 

He works raising and selling pigs, work he learned on his own. 

He asks for this loan to purchase some small pigs and care for them and raise them to later sell them.

He is a visionary man with a great will, since he dreams big and has the desire to have a large capacity of pigs. 

He has big plans and expectations for this project and trusts in the good hearts of the Kiva lenders to grow as a businessman.

In your hands rests Catalino's business to prosper in time. Come on!

loans.use: to purchase some small pigs and care for them and raise them to later sell them.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Padre de 1 hijo y con un gran deseo verlo convertido en un profesional es el motivo que llena de entusiasmo y animo al señor Jose de 57 años de edad a trabajar incansablemente en su criadero de cerdos pues aspira que con este humilde empleo brindarles una buena educación a su hijo ya que no quiere verlos en un corral realizando estas funciones.

Necesita de una actividad capaz de generar los recursos suficientes para cubrir estos gastos y sin descuidar los gastos primordiales del hogar.

Se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de alimento para sus cerdos y de esta forma aumentar su producción y mejorar la calidad de sus animales.

Jose está muy motivado con este gran proyecto ya que su hijo demuestra buenas actitudes estudiantiles y disposición para triunfar y hacer que sus padres se sientan más que orgulloso.
texts.en:
Being the father of one son and a great desire to see him become a professional, is the motivation that fills José, 57 years old, with enthusiasm and energy to work tirelessly at raising pigs since he hopes that with his humble work to offer his son a good education since he doesn't want to see him in a corral doing this work.

He needs a job capable of generating sufficient resources to cover these costs without neglecting to take care of the basic expenses of his household.

He needs to ask for a loan to purchase feed for his pigs and in this way increase his production and improve the quality of his animals.

José is very motivated with this big project since his son shows good student aptitude and the disposition to triumph and make his parents feel more than proud.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his pigs and in this way increase his production and improve the quality of his animals.

loans.name: John Octavio

texts.es:
En el municipio de Medellín, habitan muchos hombres emprendedores y trabajadores con las ganas y fuerzas para salir adelante y luchar por un buen futuro; uno de ellos es John, un hombre que con su carisma y gran capacidad de trabajo ha podido superar varios obstáculos que se le han presentado en su vida.

Tiene un pequeñísimo negocio de fabricación y venta de sillas artesanales en su propia casa, oficio que inicio con el objetivo de encontrar su sustento

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como lazos plásticos, pegas, grapas, entre otros.

Con estos elementos podrá mejorar el proceso de fabricación de sus obras, que son vendidas principalmente en almacenes, ferias, y algunos habitantes del municipio.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Medellin, there are many hardworking and enterprising men with the strength and will to get ahead and fight for a better future; one of them is John, a man who has been been able to overcome all of the obstacles that life has placed in front of him with his charisma and great skill as a worker.

He has a very small business making and selling artisanal chairs out of his own home, a trade that he undertook for the purpose of finding a way to make a living.

He's applying for a loan to purchase materials such as plastic ties, adhesives, staples, and more.

With these resources he'll be able to improve the building process of his projects, which are sold mainly in warehouses, fairs and to a few residents of the municipality.

loans.use: To purchase materials such as plastic ties, adhesives, staples, and more.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is a responsible mother of one child. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for ten years. He is responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family. He needs to make maintenance of his taxi, because the current condition of it is not good. It requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to make maintenance of his taxi. Therefore, Rukhsana has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Rukhsana's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Rukhsana also plans to make savings with the profit amount of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future. Rukhsana is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband to repair his taxi

loans.name: Priyanka

texts.en:
Priyanka is a cheerful and hardworking woman of 23 years. She is married and the mother of a small son. She and her husband are raising their son together. She lives with her family in a small village of Alipurduar District.

Priyanka’s husband is an auto driver by profession. His earnings are hardly sufficient to cover all household costs. Priyanka is involved with a sewing work business to earn independently. She learned sewing work in her young age, and now she is implementing her knowledge to give financial support to her family.

She sews varieties of garments as per the order of her customers. There is a high demand for her sewn dresses, as there is no other good seamstress in their locality. She earns a good income for the family. Her neighbors are her main customers. They appreciate her work, and she has goodwill in her neighborhood.

Currently, she would like to purchase a modern sewing machine and some stitching materials for the expansion of her business, which will work better, and to stitch higher quality clothing. So, she has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner). She hopes for a better result in the future.

Priyanka is grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and other stitching materials for her existing sewing work business.

loans.name: Kamala

texts.en:
Kamala is a 20-year-old young entrepreneur from Alipurduar, West Bengal. She studied up to grade eight. Her husband Mridul is engaged with a clothing business.

Kamala runs a grocery store from her house autonomously. She started her business with a small amount of capital. In the course of hard work, she has been able to develop and expand her merchandise. The profits from this business have allowed her to expand her sales volume.

For the purpose of further developing her business, Kamala turned to Kiva's partner BJS. She is requesting a loan to buy more grocery items (such as salt, sugar, oil, biscuits, flour, rice, etc.) to be able to meet the demand of her customers as well as earn more income to strengthen the family economy for a better future.

Her dream is to expand her existing grocery shop. She is grateful to her lenders for this financial support.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items for her existing grocery shop.

loans.name: Comadres De Cotoca Group

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 40 años de edad, soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 14, 17, 19 y 21 años, y su negocio es la venta de refrescos hervidos naturales.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, comprensiva, generosa, responsable y muy trabajadora. 
Ana es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (al centro, viste; polera verde, suéter blanco y calza negra). Su vida la comparte con sus hijos; el mayor estudia y trabaja y los menores estudian en la escuela. Viven en un cuarto propio construido de madera con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Debido a sus deseos de superación, esta vez ella lidera la banca de emprendimiento, sus compañeros desarrollan negocios como; venta de delantales, artesanía en cuero, comercio de medicina natural, venta de polleras, venta de comida, venta de chamarras para niños y taller de soldadura, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de jugos naturales hervidos, como; Somó y chicha. Ambas son bebidas refrescantes a base de harina de maíz y otra a base de maní. Actividad que desarrolla durante toda la semana en su puesto de venta fijo; “durante el día me ocupo de los refrescos, por las noches me dedico a la venta de artesanía…” comenta. la ventaja de sus actividades es que son independientes, la desventaja es la falta de capital de trabajo para ambas actividades. Su sueño es abrir un puesto de venta en el mercado de artesanía, ella desea invertir en ambas actividades mediante la compra de; maíz, maní, azúcar, etc. Para su actividad de venta de jugos y cuero, madera, arcilla, etc., para su actividad de artesanía. Esta es la 4 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que desarrolla ambas actividades.
Es por esos motivos que Ana solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de trabajo para sus negocios de venta de jugos y venta de artesanía
texts.en:
Ana is a 40-year-old woman, single, and has 4 children, ages 14, 17, 19 and 21, and her business is selling natural boiled refreshments. She is a good mother, enterprising, understanding, generous, responsible, and very hard-working. 

Ana has dark skin, long black hair she keeps tied up, is short, has a medium physique, her native language is Guaraní which she speaks locally, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the work she does (she is in the middle, wearing a green t-shirt, white sweater and black shoes). She shares her life with her children. The oldest one studies and works and the younger ones go to school. They live in their own room built of wood with a roof of metal sheeting and a brick floor which has running water, electricity and sewer services. Due to her desire to improve herself, this time she leads the business bank. Her partners work in business such as selling aprons, leather crafts, selling natural medicines, selling polleras [traditional Andean skirts], selling food, selling children's jackets, and a welding shop, and ask for a loan and improve their businesses. 

Her business is selling boiled natural juices such as somó and chicha. Both are refreshing drinks, one with a base of corn flour and the other with a peanut base. She does this work all week in her established food stall. "During the day I work with the soft drinks, at night I work selling crafts..." she says. The advantage of her work is that they are independent. The disadvantage is the lack of working capital for both businesses. Her dream is to open a sales space in the craft market. She wants to invest in both businesses through the purchase of corn, peanuts, sugar, etc. for her business selling juices and leather, wood and clay, etc. for her crafts business. This is her fourth loan cycle with the institution in the 1 year that she has done both businesses.

For these reasons, Ana asks for a loan to purchase working material for her businesses selling juice and selling crafts.

loans.use: to purchase working material for her businesses selling juices and selling crafts.

loans.name: Lot

texts.en:
Lot is a 61-year-old married mother of four children. She resides in Takeo province in Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than 30 years. Her husband is 71 years old and earns some income from rice cultivation. One of her children work in a company and one as a construction worker. Her other two children are attending school. 

Together, Lot and her husband can make an income of $36 daily. She wants to buy piglets to fatten and sell but she does not have enough money, so she is now requesting a Kiva loan through Kredit MFI. With this loan, she will have enough finances to buy piglets to fatten and earn additional income to improve her living standards. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and renovate her house and support her children to earn high education.

loans.use: buy piglets

loans.name: Psơn-We Love Cattles Group

texts.en:
Hương is 35 years old and she is married.She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for 5 years.Hương lives in Bim Son town, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover this job is unstable. 

In 2014, Hương joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Hương has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the leader of "PSơn-We love cattles" solidarity group. The main hardship that Hương faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in future.

With her business profit, Hương hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: buy piglets

loans.name: N3_Kp1_Psơn_Repay Timely Group

texts.en:
Duyên is 50 years old and she is a single parent with 2 children. She has had a retail business selling cake, sweet, sugar, milk, etc. for 5 years.

Duyên lives in Bim Son town, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover this job is unstable. She has no collateral and can't get loans from other banks or credit institutions.  The main hardship that Duyên faces is lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more cake, sweet, suger, milk, etc. to resell.

In 2014, Duyên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Duyên has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  With her business profit, Duyên hopes for her business to do well, to travel for vacation within the country, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is a married woman with five children who are all in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Tessie is 41 years old.

Tessie has a livestock raising business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.  She had successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Tessie has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Tessie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy livestock feed, vitamins & supplies

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad works hard to support her family. Trinidad is married and has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines.

Trinidad requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish for her business.  She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Trinidad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
Florenda, a 40-year-old married woman with five children, four of whom are currently in school, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has been operating a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines for the past six years.

Florenda has requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Vicenta works hard to support her family. She has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs and from a general store. 

Vicenta is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers for her fruit and vegetable vending business.

Vicenta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: buy fruits & vegetables

loans.name: Erick Francisco

texts.es: Erick Francisco, tiene la edad  de 21 años, está en unión libre, vive con su hijo y esposa, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol que se adapte bien a las condiciones de la zona y de buena calidad y que tenga una buena geminación y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Erick Francisco, age 21, is in a common-law marriage.  He lives with his son and his wife, who are his greatest priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy bean seeds that adapt well to the conditions in the area, that are good quality, and that have good germination.  He will also buy fertilizers and other products to apply to the crop, he will pay for the labor to apply the products, and he will pay for care of the crops once they begin growing.  This way he will be assured of doing a good job.

He intends to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions that exist in the area for this crop.  He will also put into practice several years of experience in handling basic grains.  He will also be able to buy the best quality products so that his crops have a good and healthy development, an adequate harvest, and significant short term production.

He wants to use the income from the harvest that he hopes to get for his family’s well-being, their education, to meet some family goals, and to continue investing in his crops.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had other loans with state banks. FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan with easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 56 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell like cooking oil, sanitary pads, canned goods, beers, coffee, juices, cereals, etc. 

Nenita has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from food vending. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like cooking oil, sanitary pads, canned goods, beers, coffee, juices, cereals, etc.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 32 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

Rosa has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from raising livestock. Rosa aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Shaheen

texts.en:
Shaheen is a responsible mother of six children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for 25 years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to make maintenance of his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good and it requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. 

Due to insufficient financial means Shaheen's husband is unable to make maintenance of his taxi. Therefore Shaheen has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.  With the help of this loan Shaheen's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide the better transport facilities to earn profitable income. Shaheen  also plans to make savings with the profit amount from her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future.

Shaheen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: repair her husband's taxi

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 40-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan's, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and five children. Her husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market for five years.  Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.

Parveen's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories, e.g. pieces of clothes, laces, needles, and sewing machine accessories. But due to financial constraints her husband is not in suitable condition to buy these items for his business purpose. Therefore Parveen has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount she will financially assist her husband to the above tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn more profitable income.

On this financial assistance Parveen is very thankful to KIVA and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: buy tailoring supplies

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.es:
Hortencia, de 48 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, no siguió estudiando porque su madre falleció y ya no tubo ayuda de nadie, está soltera y no tiene hijos, solo vive con su hermana.

Hortencia, se dedica a trabajar como sastre desde hace 4 años, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a un curso que impartió la alcaldía de su municipio y ella se inspiro en las modas, fue así como decidió seguir en esta actividad; pero además hace atol y empanadas para salir a vender.

Hortencia, necesita el crédito para comprar materia prima como maíz, plátanos, papas, cominos, achote y repollos para preparar el atol y las empandas.

Los sueños Hortencia son, comprar un terreno que está cerca de su casa y que desde hace años le están ofreciendo, con el fin de venderlo a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Hortencia is 48 years old and went to school until the sixth grade. She did not continue her studies because her mother passed away and then she had no help from anyone. Hortencia is unmarried and has no children, but she lives with her sister.

Hortencia has worked as a tailor for four years. She learned this trade thanks to a course offered by the mayor’s office in her town. She was inspired by fashion, so she decided to continue with this profession. However, she also makes atol and empanadas to sell.

She needs this loan to buy raw ingredients like corn, plantains, potatoes, cumin, annatto and cabbage to make atol and empanadas.

Hortencia’s dream is to buy a plot of land near to her house that has been offered to her for years, with the eventual goal of selling it at a higher price.

loans.use: buy raw ingredients like corn, plantains, potatoes, cumin, annatto and cabbage to make atol and empanadas.

loans.name: Luz Emilia

texts.es:
40 años de edad, una sonrisa simpática y mucho amor por sus hijos es lo que hoy en día proyecta la señora Luz.

Se gana la vida con la preparación y venta de alimentos en el municipio de Marinilla. De este negocio saca para pagar los gastos de su hogar y para el sostenimiento de la educación de sus hijos. 

Su fuerza y motivación la saca del amor que profesa hacia su familia.

Pide un apoyo económico con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de un horno, una mesa e ingredientes para sus preparaciones.

Esto le permitirá consolidar y aumentar su negocio en gran medida.
texts.en:
40 years old, a kind smile and much love for her children is how Luz presents herself today. She earns a living making and selling food in the municipality of Marinilla. This business allows her to pay household expenses and to continue the education of her children. Her strength and motivation derive from the love she has for her family.

Luz is requesting financial support from the Interactuar Corporation for the purchase of an oven, a table and ingredients for her products. This will allow her to consolidate and expand her business a great deal.

loans.use: to buy an oven, a table and ingredients for her products.

loans.name: Kabita

texts.en:
Twenty-seven-year-old Kabita lives in a remote village, Raychenga, in Falakata, Alipurduar district. Her family comprises her husband and three children (two sons and a daughter). In her childhood, Kabita never got a chance to attend school because of her family's financial issues, so she is illiterate but can sign her name. Amongst her children, two are attending school and one is a preschooler.

Kabita's husband works as a mason. Due to the irregular job, his income is inconsistent and hardly sufficient for the family of five members. To meet the family’s expenses, Kabita has been rearing a dairy cow, and her source of income comes from selling milk in her locality. She started this business because cows' milk is in much demand in her region. So, she wants to purchase another dairy cow for the expansion of her business, and for this she has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner).

With this, she will get more milk to sell; thus earn more money for her family. She will be able to bear the cost of her children's education, which is her first priority. She also has a long-cherished dream of constructing a concrete house for them in the future.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for expanding her milk supply business.

loans.name: Sakina's Group

texts.en:
Sakina is a 45-year-old poor lady. The financial condition of her family is not good and their living standards seem not fit for human beings. She wants to establish her house and change the living standards of her family.

Her whole family depends upon a single earning person. Her husband drives an auto rickshaw which is their single source of income. Sakina wants to buy an additional rickshaw for her son as well. He wants to assemble a new auto rickshaw from a maker. He has collected almost the full amount but is short of the total.

Therefore, Sakina wants to receive a loan for her son so he can buy his own auto rickshaw. In this way she will encourage her son, so that he can drive his new rickshaw and can generate income for her family.

Sakina hopes that her son will be stable in this profession and drive the auto rickshaw for a long time. She is very thankful to Kiva and to its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son's transportation services.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: repair her husband's taxi

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is a 32-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of four sons. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days his rickshaw has not been working properly, therefore he is unable to generate any amount of income. Her husband wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Therefore, Sumaira has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan, to help her husband cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Sumaira is so very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband to repair his rickshaw.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario de 56 años de edad habita en vivienda propia con sus dos hijas de 12 y 16 años de edad él es muy responsable y dedicado con ellas. Mario se ha dedicado a  la agricultura y a trabajos de albañil, además hace 1 año presta sus servicios como encargado de peceras en una empresa cercana a su vivienda. Mario solicito un crédito anteriormente el cual utilizo para mejorar una parte del piso de su casa ahora nuevamente él solicita un crédito para mejorar las paredes de su hogar ya que están hechas de adobe para lo cual solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena y grava para encementar las paredes y una parte del piso de su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
56 year old Mario lives in his own home with his two daughters, who are 12 and 16 years old. He is a very responsible man and is dedicated to them.
Mario makes a living working in agriculture and as a mason, and a year ago he offered his services as a fish tank manager at a business near his house.
Mario requested a loan previously which he used to improve a part of the floor of his house. Now he is asking for a loan to improve the walls of his home which are made of sun-dried brick. He therefore asks for a loan with FUSAI to invest in cement, sand and gravel to improve the walls and a part of the floor of his home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, and gravel to improve the walls and a part of the floor of his home.

loans.name: Berlin

texts.es:
El señor Berlín es un hombre casada de 40 años de edad, un orgullos agricultor que planta uno de los productos más típicos en la región antioqueña el cual es el frijol, este negocio con el cual genera el sustento para su familia y paga sus deudas, lo heredo de su familia y aprendió a ejercerlo gracias a lo aprendió de su padre.

Su mayor deseo es comprar una vivienda, trabajo muy duro en su cultivo para generar los recursos suficientes para adquirirla, sabe que en el futuro la obtendrá.

Berlín quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de productos agrícolas tales como abonos, venenos  y semilla de frijol.
texts.en:
Berlín is a  40 year-old married man. He is a proud farmer who plants one of the most typical products of the Antioquian region: the bean. 

This business generates the income to support his family and pay his debts. He inherited it from his family and learned to run it thanks to what he learned from his father.

His greatest wish is to buy a home. He works very hard in his fields to create enough resources to buy it. He knows that in the future he will obtain it.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products such as fertilizers, poisons and bean seed.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn, 30 years old and single, been raising livestock in the Philippines five years now. She has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her enterprise and is now requesting a new loan for PHP 12000 loan to buy feeds and other supplies for her livestock. 

In the future, Marlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Rosa Enid

texts.es: Rosa Enid, tiene la edad  de 60 años, está casada, vive con su esposo y sus hijos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  de almácigo de café que se adapte bién a las condiciones de clima y suelo de la zona y de buena calidad y que tenga una buen desarrollo y compra de fertilizantes  y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo del café. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rosa Enid is 60 years old, married, and lives with her husband and her children, who are her first priority.

With her loan she wants to purchase seedlings for coffee plants, which will adapt well to the weather conditions and thee soil in the area, which will be of good quality and develop well. She also wants to buy fertilizer and other products to apply to the seedlings. Furthermore, she wants to pay for labor to prepare the land, for works to help the rain water not to cause damage through erosion, for the application of the products, and for help with the plantation once it is growing. This way she wants to make sure to do good work.

Her intention is to make use of the great climate conditions and soil of this area for this kind of cultivation, and also to put her many years of experience growing coffee into practice.

Furthermore, she wants to be able to buy the best products with the best quality so her plantation will develop well, be healthy, and have a good harvest to have an important production in a short while.

With the income she expects to gain from the crop she wants to invest in the well-being and education of her family, achieve some family goals, and also invest further in her plantation.

This is her first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has never had other loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with the best conditions and the lowest interest rates.

loans.use: Asistencia para el café

loans.name: Guillermo De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Guillermo es un luchador, emprendedor, una persona siempre impulsada para adelante, residente de fredonia, un hombre que gusta del trabajo independiente y ejerce la labor de marquetería.

A sus 61 años de edad sigue teniendo energías de adolescente para trabajar, vive solo, se preocupa únicamente pro su mantenimiento y que su negocio crezca.

Guillermo lo único que tiene es su empresa, para él es muy importante que esta prevalezca en el tiempo ya que pro su avanzada edad le sería muy difícil conseguir algún empleo, y al no tener alguien al lado no tendría en quien apoyarse.

Guillermo quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de los insumos principales para desarrollar su profesión los cuales son madera y vidrio, con los que atenderá  un pedido que tiene pendiente.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a tenacious entrepreneur.  He is a person who is always driven to get ahead.  He lives in Fredonia.  He is a man who likes to work independently, and he does marquetry work.

At the age of 61 he still has the energy for work of an adolescent.  He lives alone.   He only concerns himself with his sustenance and with his business growing.

The only thing Guillermo has is his business.  It is very important to him that it prevails in time.  This is because, at his advanced age, it would be very difficult to get employment.  Not having anyone at his side, he would not have someone to support him.

Guillermo wants to request a loan to buy the main supplies to conduct his business.  He will buy wood and glass, which he will use to tend to an order he has pending.

loans.use: to buy wood and glass, which he will use to tend to an order he has pending.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada, es madre de una joven de 23 años de edad, la cual estudia y un niño de 12 años el cual esta cursando el último año de primaria. Doña Marlene desde muy joven le gustaba venir a pasear a Costa Rica, con el tiempo ella decide venirse a vivir a Costa Rica junto con sus primas, en ese entonces trabajaba en casas, realizando las labores domésticas, con los años de experiencia adquiridos actualmente trabaja para Hotel Radisson, logrando ahorrar un capital y desde hace tres años lo cual le permitió comprar pantalones colombianos y productos de catálogo de uso personal. Vende a sus compañeras de trabajo. Debido a un préstamo que solicito junto con su esposo para poder adquirir una casa propia, ella debe asumir gran parte de los gastos del hogar, ya que su esposo paga el préstamo y ella los gastos del hogar, ese fue el trato acordado. Es por ese motivo que no puede dejar de trabajar y lo complementa con esta actividad productiva para poder asumir los gastos presentes. Necesita este crédito para comprar los artículos que le solicitan. Su sueño es colocar una tienda de ropa Colombiana en su casa.
texts.en:
Marlene is 42 years old, married, and the mother of a 23-year-old daughter who studies and a 12-year-old son who is in his final year of primary school.

Marlene has, since she was very young, liked to travel around Costa Rica. In time, she decided to move to Costa Rica to live with her cousins. In those initial days, she worked in homes doing domestic chores. After years of experience, she now works for the Hotel Radisson, and has managed to save up some capital. Three years ago she began to purchase Colombian pants and other catalog personal-use products to sell. 

She sells these items to her companions at work. With the loan she is requesting, and her husband's efforts, Marlene hopes to acquire her own house. She intends to take charge of most household expenses, and her husband will pay off the loan while she covers those household expenses. This is their plan. 

For this reason, Marlene plans to continue working and hopes her productivity will permit her to assume expenses. She needs this loan to purchase the sales articles she is ordering.

Marlene's dream is to establish a store to sell Colombian clothing in her home.

loans.use: to order Colombian clothing to sell in Costa Rica.

loans.name: Aloka

texts.en:
Aloka is a 32-year-old housewife who lives in a small village at Alipurduar district. She is blessed with two sons. Both are students of grades six and four respectively. She attended school up to grade six and could not proceed due to the poor economic resources of her family.

Her husband keeps himself busy with a movable panipuri counter on wheels. "Panipuri" is a popular street snack in India and is called "phuchka" in the Bengali language. It consists of a round hollow puri, fried crisp and filled with potato chat and flavored water.

After managing all household responsibilities, Aloka prepares these panipuris at home, and her husband sells them to different public places in their village through the counter on wheels. As their phuchka is in great demand in her area, Aloka wishes to expand the business by purchasing more varieties of essential ingredients such as flour, tamarind, chili, chat masala, peas, potatoes, etc., to prepare more tasty phuchka to attract the customers. So, she has requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

With this, she will increase her production for sale, which will enable her to strengthen the family’s economy. Aloka has a great desire to admit her children to a renowned school for their better education. So, she wants to go ahead with this profitable business.

Aloka is very thankful to BJS and Kiva for their kind support.

loans.use: to purchase more necessary ingredients for her husband's panipuri-selling business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una mujer de 39 años de edad es casada vive junto a su esposo en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá.
Santos para poder adquirir sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años esta labor lo aprendió ella de sus padres, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica. Santos  desde hace algún tiempo tiene sembrando unas cuerdas de hortalizas que en estos momentos ya necesitan de su mantenimiento, aunque una de las dificultades que santos tiene es que no tiene el dinero necesario para poder comprar sus fertilizantes, insecticidas y fungicidas por tal motivo solicita un préstamo para poder adquirir sus insumos agrícolas y poder obtener al final de la temporada una buena cosecha.
El gran sueño de Santos es ampliar su cultivo para mejorar sus ingresos y contar con una casa digan de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is a 39-year-old man who is married and lives with his spouse in a community in the department of Sololá. In order to earn an income and support his spouse with household expenses, he has worked in agriculture for 10 years. She learned this work from her parents, but in order to further improve her income she also makes typical clothing. 
For some time now, Santos has also been cultivating crops on a plot of land, which currently needs maintenance. However, one of Santos' challenges is that he doesn't have sufficient funds in order to purchase fertilizer, insecticides, and fungicides.
