Thus, he is requesting this loan in order to acquire these agricultural supplies and obtain a good harvest at the end of the season. Santos' biggest dream is to increase the crops he grows in order to improve his income and have a decent house for his family.

loans.use: Compra de fertilizantes, insecticidas y fungicidas.

loans.name: Bernabe

texts.es:
El Sr. Bernabe es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que desde siempre se ha esforzado para poder salir adelante. Él es contratista de obras, y siempre ha luchado y crecido por su familia.
Él Sr. Bernabe está poniendo todo de sí para poder crecer y mejorar cada día en lo que hace, y dar a su familia todo lo que no ha podido tener. Pide este préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para poder seguir con su trabajo de contratista y poder cumplir así con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Bernabe is from the city of Paraguarí. He is a very determined and hard-working person who has always made an effort in order to get on in life. He is a building contractor and has always worked hard and made progress for his family. Bernabe is doing all he can to grow and improve every day at what he does, and to give his family everything that he hasn't been able to have.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy building materials so he can continue with his work as a building contractor and so satisfy his customers.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: electrical wire, breakers, current readers, metal boxes, telephone jacks, screwdrivers, insulation tape, pliers, etc.

loans.name: Kukuli Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KUKULI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Valerka ,la socia tiene 41 años de edad es casada y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a trabajar en uno de los colegios de la ciudad del Cusco en el area administrativa, la socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, la socia a la vez se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como cremas,pefumes entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de colonias entre otros.
 Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “KUKULI” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco. It belongs to the province and department of Cuzco. One of the members is Mrs. Valerka. She is 41 years old, married and has two children. She alternates between two occupations. She works in administration at one of the schools in the city of Cusco. She is thankful to the people who are a part of her dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time. Mrs. Valerka sells beauty products such as creams and perfumes, among other things. This is how she supports her family. She is requesting a loan to buy perfumes, among other things. The members who are in the attached photo asked for permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work.
The person whose face is blurred out is not a member of the group.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, among other things.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 35 years old and has four children. She is married and has three children who are currently in school.

Rosalinda is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosalinda requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rosalinda has been in pig fattening for two years now and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Maria Aydee

texts.es:
María, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, ella quería estudiar una carrera universitaria pero sus condiciones económicas y las de su familia se lo impidieron, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres. 

María, estudio un curso gratis de sastrería en su comunidad y le a su madre en este rubro cuando tiene que hacer los uniformes para una escuela, María le ayuda durante la tarde o noche, porque en el día trabaja donde una prima vendiendo agua y jugos en el centro de la ciudad.

María, se dedica a laborar como vendedora informal de jugos de naranja y agua helada en el negocio de una prima y para llegar al puesto tiene que viajar 3 kilómetros y su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. porque las personas compran el jugo natural para el desayuno y su hora de salida es a las 2:00 de la tarde.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para cultivar maíz y frijol y para pagar mano de obra para trabajar los cultivos, ya que quien los hace es su padre y tiene que pagar otras personas que lo ayuden; de la cosecha que su padre obtenga comerán ella, sus hijos y sus padres durante el próximo año.

Ella desea poder hacerle mejoras a la casa de sus padres, que es donde ella vive actualmente porque es de bahareque y también desea que sus hijos estudien y puedan tener mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
María is 31 years old. She studied up to high school. She wanted to study for a university degree, but economic conditions and her family held her back. She is a single mother of two children and lives in her parents' house.  

María studies a free tailoring course in her community and helps her mother in this area when they make uniforms for school. María helps her during the afternoon or night, because during the day she works selling water and juice in the city centre. 

María makes a living working as a casual vendor of orange juice and ice water. To get to the place she has to travel 3 kilometres. Her work hours start at 6:00 a.m. because people buy the natural juice for breakfast. Her work hours end at 2:00 in the afternoon. 

She needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies to grow corn and beans and to pay labour to work the crops, since her father already works and needs to pay other people to help him; the harvest her father obtains feeds her, her children and her parents during the next year. 

She wants to be able to make improvements to her parents' house, where she currently lives, because it has mud walls. She also wants her children to study and be able to have better economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to grown corn and beans and to pay labour to work the crops

loans.name: Gloria Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ella es Gloria es una mujer de 62 años de edad que encontró en la venta de ropa una manera de generar recursos y ser de utilidad en su hogar. 
Su historia se remonta años atrás cuando intento conseguir algún empleo pero al ser rechazada por su grado de escolaridad, y falta de experiencia, encontró en un consejo de un amigo la salida a sus problemas e inicio con la venta de ropa, la cual le ha significado un aumento significativo a su calidad de vida.


Por ende Hoy se encuentra la señora Gloria pidiendo ayuda a toda la comunidad kiva para que la apoyen con un préstamo el cual promete pagarlo puntualmente para comprar mercancía y tenga la oportunidad de aumentar su utilidad y luchar por su sueño de vivienda propia y mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is a 62 year-old woman who found that selling clothing was a way to earn an income and be of use to her household. 

Her history dates back to years ago when she tried to get some work, but was rejected because of her education level and lack of experience.  She found her solution in a friend’s advice, and began to sell clothes, which has resulted in a significant improvement to her quality of life.

This is why señora Gloria is now appealing to the entire Kiva community to support her with a loan to buy her merchandise.  She will have the opportunity to be more useful and fight for her dream of her own home and better quality of life. She promises to pay punctually.

loans.use: to buy a selection of clothing.

loans.name: Marleny Del Socorro

texts.es:
Marleny es una mujer de 33 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos y se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino una actividad con la que saca adelante su familia, y lo que le ha generado un gran progreso.

Mejorar las condiciones de su casa es su sueño presente, mantener su negocio es lo principal del momento, porque a pesar de tener fuerte competencia tiene buenas ideas y un apoyo incondicional como Interactuar que está dispuesto a ofrecerle la mano cuando más lo necesita.

Marleny quiere solicitar un préstamo la razón es que busca ampliar y aprovechar el espacio disponible en sus cocheras, comprara 4 cerdos de engorde, pozo séptico.
texts.en:
Marleny, age 33, has two children.  She raises pigs, a business activity with which she gets her family ahead.  It has generated great progress for her.

Improving the condition of her house is her present dream.  Maintaining her business is the main thing of the moment.  In spite of having strong competition, she has good ideas and unconditional support like Interactuar is prepared to lend a hand when she needs it the most.

Marleny, age 33, is requesting a loan because she is looking to expand and to take advantage of the space available in her pigpens.  She will also use the loan for a septic tank.

loans.use: to buy four pigs to fatten and a septic tank.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed is a 43-year-old woman and mother of three sons. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. 

Her husband has been running a food stall. He sells different types of eatable items, e.g. samosa, vegetable rolls, chicken tikka and kabab paratha. Her husband is only responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household.

Naheed's husband needs to purchase different types of eatable and other items for his business purpose so that he can increase the size of business, improve his sales growth and earn maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position, her husband is not in the condition to purchase these items for his business purposes.

Therefore, Naheed has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for business purposes.
 
She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's food stall business

loans.name: Jennyfer Isabel

texts.es:
Jennyfer es una mujer de 19 años de edad, se dedico inicialmente al negocio de las confecciones en el cual duro tres años como operaria, después de pasar este periodo de tiempo inicio manejando un taller con un amigo el cual le enseño el oficio y la guiaba en todo el proceso para adquirir su propio negocio. 

Vive con sola y es madre de un hijo. Hace poco tiempo es una mujer independiente que gracias a los micro créditos tiene la posibilidad de ser su propia jefe y generar un empleo pues su pecera es reconocida por su buen servicio al cliente; solicita el crédito para la compra de una resortadora, telas, hilos y otros insumos.

Su principal sueño es poder compra una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Jennyfer is a 19 year old woman. At first, she made a living in the dress making business in which she lasted three years as a machine operator. After this period of time passed, she started managing a shop with a friend who showed her the trade and guided her though the whole process to acquire her own business.

She lives alone and is the mother of a son. She is recently an independent woman who thanks to the micro loans, has the possibility of being her own boss and producing a job since her shop is known for good customer service. She is requesting the loan to buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, and other supplies.

Her main dream is to be able to buy her own home.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, and other supplies.

loans.name: Champa

texts.en:
Champa is a 30-year-old woman from Itkhola village at Alipurduar. She lives there with her husband and four children (a son and three daughters). Amongst them, one is attending school and is in grade seven. Champa was deprived of receiving education in her childhood due to her family’s financial issues.

Though being a housewife, Champa serves as a cook to her village neighborhood, while her husband makes rings that are used for making wells in rural areas. The major raw materials required for making rings are cement, sand, stone dust, stone chips, iron strips, etc. As these materials are very expensive, her husband needs capital. To achieve the same, Champa applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

She will invest the loan to purchase the necessary materials in bulk for making concrete rings on a large scale so that they can supply those on time according to the market demand. It will improve her income and strengthen the family’s financial status. With the profit, she wants to expand the business widely throughout the region.

Champa is very grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase necessary materials for her husband’s concrete ring-making business.

loans.name: Jibari

texts.en:
Jibari is a 51-year-old rural married woman. She lives at Parengerpar village in Falakata, Alipurduar district. She is blessed with five children, a son and four daughters. Three daughters are married. Her only son is engaged in a carpentry business. Her husband is a farmer. Jibari is an illiterate housewife who knows to sign her name only. She keeps herself busy in household chores and sometimes tries to assist her husband and son in their respective work.

Jibari's son makes wooden furniture such as beds, chairs, shelves, tables, wardrobes, etc. as per customers' orders. In order to manufacture the furniture, he requires materials such as logs of wood, nails, paint, and good modern tools. He sells his products to the local people. He is famous for making furniture with fine finishing and durability, and which is also cheaper compared to other carpenters. The family depends mostly on his income.

Therefore, Jibari wants to access a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to buy all the required materials and modern tools for his carpentry work. Jibari hopes that it will make it possible for her son to buy good-quality wood and allow him to supply the orders on time. She also hopes that this investment will generate enough income to offer them a better quality of life and new opportunities to get ahead. She wishes to upgrade their house in the future.

Jibari is grateful to her lenders.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality wood and other necessary materials for her son's carpentry business.

loans.name: Las Divinas De La Union Group

texts.es: El Sr. Wilfredo de 50 años casado y con 1  hijo. Pertenece al grupo comunal Las Divinas de la Unión. Un grupo conformado por 6 integrantes los cuales todos tienen un  gran empeño por salir adelante y surgir hacia una economía más estable para ellos y sus familias. Tal es así el caso del Sr. Wilfredo que  se dedica al servicio de taxi ya hace más de 14 años. En el futuro le gustaría adquirir otro auto para también ponerlo a trabajar y así poder tener  más ingresos económicos. Con el préstamo otorgado por kiva lo invertirá para el mantenimiento de su vehículo y así poder trabajar con más entusiasmo. El Sr. Wilfredo se distingue por ser el único hombre en el grupo el cual viste con una camisa blanca y pantalón plomo. El grupo y él se despiden con un enorme agradecimiento a kiva y diciéndoles que cumplirán con todas sus metas  propuestas.
texts.en:
Mr. Wilfredo is 50 years old, married with 1 son. He belongs to the community group Las Divinas de la Unión. The group is formed by 6 members, all of whom have a great determination to succeed and to reach toward a more stable economy for themselves and their families. 

Such is the case for Mr. Wilfredo, who has made a living providing taxi services for more than 14 years. In the future, he would like to acquire another car to also put it to work and therefore be able to increase his profits. 

With the loan from Kiva, he will invest in the maintenance of his vehicle and therefore be able to work with more enthusiasm. Mr. Wilfred can be distinguished by being the only man in the group, who is wearing a white shirt and gray pants. He and the group say goodbye with a huge thanks to Kiva and by saying that they will complete all their proposed goals.

loans.use: to maintain their vehicle.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila continúa con su actividad de venta de comida tradicional. El préstamo que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de víveres e insumos de cocina,  como; Aceite, fideo, arroz, papa, carne, huevo, etc., el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas. 
Zoila cocina comidas como; majadito de charque (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), locro carretero cruceño (sopa de: carne deshidratada, carne cortada en pedacitos, yuca y huevo), Sopa de Remojado (sopa de huesos), 
Cogote relleno (cuello de gallina criolla, relleno puede ser de papa), sopa de maní (sopa a base de maní), locotos rellenos (locotos, carne picada, cebollas), arroz con queso (arroz, leche y queso), y otros, “las comidas tradicionales son muy populares por su forma de cocinar, mis clientes son continuos y la comida se me acaba por completo…” comenta. La ventaja de su actividad es que cuenta con clientes constantes, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de refrescos para acompañar la comida. Su sueño es ser la comidera más popular del lugar, ella desea realizar la compra de refrescos por mayor, para contar con bebidas constantemente. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Zoila solicita un préstamo para la compra de refrescos por mayor para acompañar a su comida y continuar con su negocio
texts.en:
Zoila continues with her business selling traditional food. She invested the loan she previously received in the purchase of food and kitchen supplies such as: oil, pasta, rice, potatoes, meat, eggs, etc. Her loan payments were punctual because she did not have any problems. 

Zoila makes food such as "majardito de charque" (shredded beef, rice, fried egg and fried banana), "locro carretero cruceño" (soup with dried meat, meat cut into pieces, cassava and egg), "sopa de remojado" (bone soup), "cogote relleno" (free-range chicken neck, the filling can be made with potatoes), peanut soup (soup made with peanuts), stuffed peppers (peppers, minced meat, onios), rice with cheese (rice, milk, and cheese), and others. "Traditional foods are very popular because of how they are cooked. I have regular customers and the food runs out completely," she says. The advantage of this business is that she has regular customers and the disadvantage is that she lacks capital to buy soft drinks to accompany the meals. 

Zoila's dream is to be the most popular food seller in the area. She wants to buy soft drinks wholesale so that she can always have drinks available. This is her second loan from this institution in the six years that she's been in this business. It is for these reasons that Zoila is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks wholesale to accompany her meals and to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks wholesale to accompany her food and continue her business.

loans.name: Fátima Jaqueline

texts.es:
En el barrio Altamira de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Grupo de Crédito Altamira, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros y por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico. 
En este lugar vive la señora Fátima, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos, dos mayores de edad y  tres de 17, 15 y 13 años que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Fátima es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos se dedica a la venta de sabanas, toallas, toldos y otras mercaderías, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja casi todos los días, aprovecha las horas de la mañana ya que a esa hora es más fresco y sale con más facilidad, aunque si sus clientes desean algo de lo que ella les vende la visitan en su hogar, tiene mucha clientela ya que les da crédito y cobra cada 8 o 15 días. Lleva más de 4 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse sus propios recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar sabanas, toallas, toldos, entre otras cosas que vende. Lleva más de 5 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos y su  familia.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the Altamira Credit Group meets in the neighborhood of Altamira in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited year round by national as well as international tourists. It is also one of the most important ports in the country and on the Pacific coast of America.

Fatima lives in this town. She is 37 years old, is married and has five children.  Two are older and the last three are ages 17, 15 and 13 and study in high school.  Her husband is a driver.  Dona Fatima is a housewife who, in order to earn her own money to help her husband with household expenses and the education of her children, sells sheet, towels, shades and other items door to door.  She works most days and takes advantage of cooler mornings to sell.  Her clients also visit her at her home if they have specific needs.  She has a large clientele and offers them credit, which she collects every 8 or 15 days.  

She has been doing this for more than four years, earning her own money.  This loan is to purchase sheets, towels, sunshades and other items that she sells.  She has been in the Grupo de Credito for more than five years and she likes it because thanks to the loans, she began her business.  Her dream is to provide the best to her children and her family.

loans.use: to purchase sheets, towels and sun shades, etc.

loans.name: Francis Eduvigis

texts.es:
En el barrio Altamira de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Grupo de Crédito Altamira, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros y por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico. 
En este lugar vive la señora Francis, tiene 32 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 13 y 5 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es empleado público. 
Doñas Francis con la intención de ganarse algo para los gastos de estudios de sus hijos  desde hace mas de 3 años se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de  Avon, Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, ella siempre aprovecha los productos de oferta ya que compra bastante y luego vende al precio real lo cual le deja buenos ingresos.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, cremas, perfumes, entre otros. Lleva 2 ciclos  en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos compra más ofertas. Sus sueños es darles la mejor educación a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the Altamira Credit Group meets in the neighborhood of Altamira in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited year round by national as well as international tourists. It is also one of the most important ports in the country and on the Pacific coast of America.

Francis, age 32, lives here and has a relationship from which she has two children, ages 13 and 5, both of whom study.  Her husband is a public employee. Three years ago Dona Francis decided to earn money for her children's studies and began to sell clothes and Avon products and Belcorp (beauty items, cosmetics, perfume and women's accessories).  She sells door to door in her free time as well as out of her home.  She offers credit and collects every 8 days.  She always buys at a good price and then sells at retail prices, which gives her a good profit.  

This loan will be used to buy clothes, shoes, creams, perfumes and other items.  She has done two cycles with the Grupo de Credito and she likes it because with the loans she can buy more product on sale.  Her dream is to give the best education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, shoes, creams, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Rima

texts.en:
Rima is 34 years old and married with two children. With her two children currently in school, Rima works very hard to provide for them.

Rima runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her store.

Rima has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, coffee, detergent soap, eggs, candies, noodles, etc.

In the future, Rima would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra, tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera de un hijo de dos años de edad, a pesar de las adversidades logra salir adelante con su familia; su fuente de ingresos actual es administrar una granja de pollos de engorde, la tiene funcionando desde hace tres año, trabaja a tiempo completo y heredo de sus padres el oficio.
El crédito le servirá para comprar pollos y concentrado para alimentarlos como es debido, esta inversión le permitirá tener un mejor inventario para realizar día a día sus actividades, pretende abastecer a nuevos clientes y mejorar las ganancias.
Las aspiraciones de Sandra son mantenerse luchando para que su negocio siga en el mercado y que su hijo tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Sandra is 51 years old.  She is the single mother of a two-year-old child.  In spite of adversity, she has succeeded in moving her family forward.  Her source of income is from managing a farm for broiler chickens.  It has been operating for three years.  She works full-time and she got this trade from her parents.

The loan will be used to buy chickens and chicken feed in order to nourish them in the proper manner.  This investment will enable her to have a better inventory in order to carry out her daily work.  She hopes to supply new clients and to improve her income.

Sandra's aspiration is to keep striving in order for her business to continue in the market and that her child has a better future.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed to nourish them in the proper way

loans.name: Frankil Afed

texts.es:
Frankil es un hombre de 43 años, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
El es emprendedor, independiente, generoso, sensible, responsable y trabajador. 
Su negocio lo desarrolla en el municipio de Los Córdobas; un área estratégica porque tiene un alto flujo comercial; es una vitrina de la producción de la pequeña y mediana empresa, la zona es una muestra del panorama típico comercial e industrial de la ciudad. 

Su vida la comparte con su compañera sentimental que trabaja con el.

Actividad que realiza en un local.
Su sueño es incrementar sus ingresos económicos para abrir un almacén, el desea realizar la compra de ropa al por mayor para aumentar su inventario.
texts.en:
Frankil is a 43 year old man, childless, and has a clothing business. He's enterprising, independent, generous, sensible, responsible, and hardworking. He runs his business in the municipality of Los Cordobas; a strategic area because it has high commercial activity; it's a showcase for the production of small and medium-sized businesses, and the area is representative of the city's commercial and industrial scene.

He shares his life with his romantic partner that works with him.

He does his business in a commercial establishment. His dream is to increase his income so that he can open a warehouse, and he wants to purchase clothes wholesale to increase his inventory.

loans.use: To purchase clothes wholesale to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Creer Es Poder Group

texts.es:
Este grupo esta integrado por cinco mujeres, todas vecinas de Barrio San Jorge, tienen edades entre 28 y 62 años. Se conocen desde hace mucho tiempo porque entre ellas también consumen y compran los productos de las otras, todas son comerciantes, realizan venta por catalogo, ropa interior, zapatos, bisutería y pan. Ellas iniciaron con estas actividades ya que debían aportar económicamente al hogar para mejorar su condición de vida. Recibieron el proceso de capacitación completo y se presentaron muy agradecidas y satisfechas por el conocimiento adquirido, lograron practicar correctamente las tres reglas de oro, lo que les ha permitido continuar correctamente.
Una de las integrantes doña Zoraida, tiene 53 años de edad, esta casada, es madre de tres hijos, los cuales están casados y ya no viven con ella. Actualmente ella se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo, artículos específicamente para la cocina del hogar de sus clientas. Necesita este crédito para invertir en la compra de estos productos que tanto le encargan. Eligió Fundación Mujer porque cree en su actividad productiva, con la cual genera ingresos adicionales al hogar.
En un futuro sueña con poder generar empleo a las jóvenes de la zona donde ella vive, dándoles artículos, para que los puedan revender.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five women, all of whom are neighbors in the San Jorge neighborhood. Their ages range from 28 to 62 years old. They have all known each other for a long time, because they consume and buy many products from each other. They are all retailers who sell products through catalogs, including underwear, shoes, jewelry, and bread. They started this work because they had to support their households economically in order to improve their quality of life. 

They went through the entire training process, and were very thankful and satisfied with the knowledge they acquired. They have been able to correctly practice the three golden rules, which has allowed them to continue in the right way. 

One of the members is Zoraida Barquero, who is 53 years old, married, and the mother of three children, who are married and no longer live with her. Currently, she works selling products through catalogs, specifically items for the kitchen. She needs this credit to invest in the purchase of these products that her clients order so much. She chose Fundación Mujer because she believes in her livelihood activity, which generates additional income for her household. In the future, her dream is to create employment for the youth in the area where she lives by giving them products that they can then resell.

loans.use: Para compra de mercadería

loans.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es:
Félix, es un hombre que le gusta mucho trabajar cuidando del ganado que posee y cultivando granos básicos, son actividades que ha desarrollado toda su vida, aprendió el oficio junto a su padre, ya tiene varios años de tener su negocio propio y lo hace con ayuda de obreros. Vive con su grupo familiar y no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero.
Invertirá el préstamo en la compra de abono, semilla e insecticidas, tendrá los materiales necesarios para tener preparada la tierra y sembrar granos básicos, de esta manera sus cultivos darán como resultado una cosecha abundante para darle a sus familia una alimentación adecuada y generar nuevos ingresos, además podrá producirá zacate para alimentar al ganado.
Las aspiraciones de Félix son cancelar su deuda, mantener su negocio funcionando y disminuir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Felix is a man who likes very much to work taking care of the livestock that he owns, and farming basic grains. These are activities that he has engaged in his whole life. 

He learned the profession alongside his father, and has had his own business for several years. He lives with his family group and has no help from abroad.

He will invest this loan to purchase fertilizer, seed and insecticides. He will have the materials necessary to prepare the soil and sow the basic grains. This way his crops will yield an abundant harvest to nourish his family adequately and generate new income. In addition he will be able to produce fodder to feed his livestock.

Felix aspires to cancel his debt, keep his business going and diminish his family’s needs.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of fertilizer, seed and insecticides, so that he will have the materials necessary to prepare the soil and sow basic grains.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en:
Madalena is requesting a loan of $1500.00 to improve her business. She will use the loan to add with her working capital to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as detergents, aqua, eggs, candy, sardines, coffee, including soft drinks and other things to sell. Madalena started to open her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $600.00. 

She is happy with the loan that offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she hope with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she can improve her management for her business.

loans.use: To buy detergents, aqua, eggs, candy, sardines, coffee, including soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Liliana Emperatriz

texts.es: Liliana tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Liliana es una mujer muy trabajadora que labora actualmente como vendedora en una farmacia  y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Liliana hace un tiempo solicito un crédito  para invertir en ventanas, puertas y lámina para terminar la construcción de su vivienda con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y debido a la buena experiencia ella desea continuar haciendo otras mejoras en su hogar por lo que ha decidido solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para comprar: ladrillo, piedra, arena, hierro y grava para  construir las paredes de un cuarto que actualmente está hecho de lámina que se encuentra en mal estado y en tiempos de lluvia le presenta dificultades con las filtraciones de agua que presenta.
texts.en:
Liliana is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and 4 year old. Liliana is a hardworking woman who currently works as a salesperson at a pharmacy and together with her husband takes care of the household expenses.

Some time ago Liliana asked for a loan to buy windows, doors and metal sheeing in order to finish building her home with the aim of improving their life conditions. Because of that good experience she wants to go on making other improvements to her home. This is why she decided to ask for a new loan from FUSAI to buy: bricks, stones, sand, iron, and gravel. She will build the walls of a room currently made of metal sheeting which are in poor condition. During the rainy season they present problems of leaking water.

loans.use: to buy bricks, stones, sand, iron, and gravel to build the walls of a room that currently is made of metal sheeting

loans.name: Vilma Estela

texts.es: Vilma de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su dos hijas, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol) tiene 10 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, también trabaja como empleada en una guardería, cuando ya está su cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego vender sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas etc. para continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Vilma, 41 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two daughters and works growing basic grains (corn and beans). She has been working in agriculture for 10 years, and she also works as an employee at a child care center. When the harvest is ready, she stores it in the granaries shown in the photo to later sell her products in the different markets that are near her house. She is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, herbicides, etc. to continue with her work since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Rudys Ander

texts.es: Rudys de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos tiene 15 años de dedicarse a las labores agrícolas, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía,  comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. para seguir con sus cultivos y poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Rudys is 43 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He is dedicated to the cultivation of basic grains and has 15 years of experience devoted to agricultural work. Once his crop is ready and stored in the barns shown in the photograph, he sells his products in different markets that are close to home. With his sales he has been able to take care of some household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and herbicides to continue his agricultural work and to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and herbicides

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 42 years old and has two children. She is married, and her two children are in school.

Marissa is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marissa has been in pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 18 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Marissa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Christian Alberto

texts.es:
Christian es un padre soltero de 37 años, vive junto a sus cinco hijos en casa propia en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados.
Es un señor muy trabajador y dedica a sus hijos, su madre los abandonó hace varios años atrás. A pesar de tener que criarlos solo Christian se ha esforzado mucho, ha controlado horarios para estar con sus pequeños, por eso muy por la mañana su hija mayor le ayuda a prepararlos para la escuela mientras él se prepara para salir a trabajar. Así mientras sus hijos están estudiando el sale a recorrer a vender sus jugos y come y bebe, ya lo conocen mucho en el sector ya que es el único que se dedica a este tipo de negocios, le va muy bien por el clima cálido de la ciudad.
Christian ya es cliente fiel de la Fundación, con su primer crédito pudo cambiar de coche repartidor de jugos, ya lo mejoró; ahora con este crédito él podrá comprar más fruta y elaborar sus refrescos ya que con estos ingresos podrá adquirir todo lo necesario en listas de útiles y uniformes de sus hijos ya que iniciaron a estudiar. 
Agradece a KIVA por apoyarlo y así seguir dándoles los estudios a sus cinco hijos, para que sean unos profesionales en un futuro.
texts.en:
Christian is a 37 year old single father of five children. He lives with them in their own home in Santo Domingo de los Colorados.

He is a hardworking man dedicated to his children. Their mother abandoned them several years ago. Despite having to raise them alone, Christian has put forth a lot of effort. He has controlled his schedule in order to be with his little ones. His oldest daughter helps him to prepare them for school early in the morning as he gets ready to leave for work. So while his children are at school he goes out selling juice, food, and drinks. He is known in the area as he is the only one working this sort of business and it's going well because of the warm city climate.

Christian is a loyal client of the Fundación. With his first loan he could change the fruit juice delivery cart, which is already improved. Now with this loan he will buy everything he needs on the school and uniform list for his children so they can begin to study. He finds it a little difficult to come up with the funds for everything at the start of classes.

He is grateful to the institution for helping him so he can continue providing support for his five children to study so they can become professionals in the future.

loans.use: Para comprar más fruta y poder elaborar sus refrescos, con estos ingresos apoyar a sus hijos ahora que empiezan la temporada de clases.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: Oscar de 33 años de edad, vive junto a su madre quien es una mujer soltera y junto a sus hermanos. Oscar desde muy pequeño aprendió a trabajar la tierra y actualmente se dedica a la siembra de loroco el cual lo vende en el mercado a un buen precio, además se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, y es de esta manera como se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día hasta su hogar. Oscar solicita crédito a FUSAI para comprar: ganado y comida de la mejor calidad para los animales, además desea comprar también semilla para seguir sembrando y fertilizantes, abonos y venenos para plagas para seguir cosechando lorocos de buena calidad,  esto le permitiría aumentar el precio del ganado y la calidad de productos que comercializa, de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas y las ganancias. Oscar es un hombre muy trabajador el cual depende por completo de este negocio, es por ello que es de mucha importancia el poder mantenerlo a flote, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee. Él desea aprovechar no solo la experiencia con la que cuenta sino también el terreno que tiene el cual es apto para la crianza del ganado y cosecha de loroco.
texts.en:
Oscar is 33 years old. He lives with his mother who is a single woman and with his brothers. 

Oscar learned to work the land when he was very young and currently he is planting loroco [a small green unopened flower bud used as an herb] which he sells at the market at a good price. He also works buying and selling cattle and this is the way he makes a living and brings home the daily bread.

Oscar is asking for a loan from FUSAI to buy cattle and good quality feed for the animals. In addition, he wants to also buy seed in order to go on planting and fertilizing, compost, and pest control in order to harvet good quality loroco. This will alow him to increase the price of the cattle and the quality of products he sells so he can increaase his sales and profits

Jose is a hardworking man who depends entirely on this business which is for him an important reason to keep it afloat as it is the only source of income he has.

He wants to take advantage not only of his experience but also the land which is suitable for raising cattle and harvesting loroco.

loans.use: to buy cattle and good quality feed, seed so he can go on planting, and fertilizers, compost, and pest control, to continue harvesting good quality loroco.

loans.name: Rarotonga

texts.en:
Rarotonga is 41 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for 3 years.

 Rarotonga has requested a loan to buy flour,sugar,cooking oil,gas,containers,fry pan etc. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Rarotonga will extend her business and to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy flour,sugar,cooking oil,gas,containers,fry pan etc

loans.name: N2 Th6 Qlưu - Women Do Economic Activities Group

texts.en:
Mrs Nguyệt is 50 years old and she is married.  She has operated a food stall selling vegetables in the local market for more than 10 years.
Nguyệt lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover the market need is low in this region.
 
The main hardship that Nguyệt faces is lack of capital. In 2014, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. 

Nguyệt has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  She is the group leader of the "N2 Th6 QLưu - women do economic activities" solidarity group now.   

She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell.
With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell, to increase her profit for the benefit of her family

loans.name: Arabela Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Arabela está conformado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras, coordinado por Auxiliadora de 46 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos que estan bajo su cargo , ella se dedica a la venta de carne de res,carne de cerdo y carne de pollo desde hace seis años, es el décimo ciclo de trabajar con la institucion, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado maximizar sus ganancias. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de carne de res,  carne de pollo y carne de cerdo, una de sus metas es mantener el negocio y evolucionar el dinero, Luisa es la segunda socia quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos,la tercer socia es Mayda se dedica a la venta de tortilla y  Petrona quien es la cuarta socia se dedica a la venta de ropa interior.
texts.en:
The Arabela solidarity group is composed of four enterprising women, coordinated by Auxiliadora. She is 46 years old, and the single mother of two children for whom she works hard every day. Auxiliadora has sold meat, including beef, pork and chicken, for the last six years. 

This is the group's sixth loan cycle to request financing through ADIM. With previous loans they managed to maximize their earnings. A portion of the loan they are requesting now is for purchasing beef, chicken and pork. 

One of the group's goals is to maintain their businesses and make their money grow. The second group member is Luisa who sells cosmetics, the third member is Mayda who sells tortillas, and the fourth member is Petrona who sells underwear.

loans.use: to buy beef, chicken and pork to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support her family. She is married and has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 14 years now.

Evangeline requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her bicycle.

Evangeline would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her bicycle.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Elsie requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for four years now.

Elsie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Jonathan Alberto

texts.es: Jonathan es un joven emprendedor de la ciudad de Barranquilla, convencido de que su negocio de comidas rápidas le proporciona un ingreso mensual atractivo y seguro, pues son muchas las personas que diariamente salen de sus casas desde temprano y regresan a sus hogares prácticamente al anochecer; en el sector donde está ubicado su negocio es muy común este comportamiento por lo tanto las comidas rápidas no sólo les resultan tentadoras, sino también económicas y prácticas.  Esta idea de negocio surgió gracias a la sugerencia de un amigo y hace año y medio, Jonathan decidió organizar su punto de venta en donde ofrece perros calientes, hamburguesas, salchipapas, pinchos y refrescos, él se esfuerza por lograr el reconocimiento de sus clientes, por la satisfacción en el consumo de sus productos al competir con  calidad y ofrecer un buen servicio, mejorándolo cada día más para lo cual está tramitando su primer credi kiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, recursos que planea invertir en la compra de nuevas sillas y mesas y la compra de ingredientes al por mayor para lograr un mejor precio, duplicar sus ventas actuales y lograr un mejor margen de ganancias que le permitan reunir los recursos necesarios para lograr su meta de adquirir su propio apartamento.
texts.en: Jhonatan is a young entrepreneur from the city of Barranquilla who is certain that his business selling fast foods provides him with an attractive and reliable monthly income, as there are many people who leave their homes very early and return home practically at nightfall.  In the area where his business is located this is very common, which is why fast food is not only tempting, but economical and practical as well.  This business idea came about thanks to a suggestion from a friend and a year and a half ago Jhonatan decided to set up his sales point where he offers hot dogs, hamburgers, kebabs, brochettes, and soft drinks.  He puts effort into being recognized by his customers by making sure they are satisfied with the quality of his products and by offering good service, improving it every day, which is why he is requesting his first Kiva loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He plans to use the money to buy new chairs and tables and to buy ingredients wholesale so he can get a better price, double his current sales, and achieve a better profit margin, which will allow him to put aside the money he needs to achieve his goal of getting his own apartment.

loans.use: to buy new chairs and tables and to buy ingredients wholesale so he can get a better price.

loans.name: Edwin David

texts.es:
Edwin tiene 28 años de edad es soltero vive con su madre en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Rumicurco,
Pertenece a La V.R.C Mushuc Pakari se dedica a la agricultura, el se dedica a la cria de animales, solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos y cerdos para engordarles y luego venderlos, el vende en la feria de Guaranda en el mercado los dias Sabados de cada semana, su sueño es tener una granja de pollos muy grande para venser huevos y asi obtener mas ingresos y tener su negocio renteble, en su tiempo libre le gusta jugar cons su vecinos boli.
texts.en:
Edwin is 28 years old and single. He lives with his mother in the community of Rumicurco in Guaranda, Bolivar province. He is part of the Mushuc Pakari communal bank and works in agriculture. He earns his living raising animals. 

Edwin is requesting the loan to purchase chickens and pigs to fatten and then sell. He sells in a street fair in the Guaranda market every Saturday. His dream is to have a very big chicken farm so he can sell eggs in order to obtain income and have a profitable business. In his free time, he likes to play volleyball with his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy animals

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es: Juan Manuel es un agricultor que se dedica a la siembra de café, maíz y frijol; tiene su propia  parcela de tierra en donde produce sus cultivos. En la comunidad donde vive Juan Manuel no hay acceso a energía eléctrica por lo cual debe recorrer largas distancias para cargar su teléfono celular. Además debe gastar en compra de kerosén y velas para iluminación. Esto obstaculiza también su labor como cosechador de café, porqué al no tener una buena iluminación se atrasa y no puede expulpar el café con mayor rapidez.  Por esto Juan Manuel necesita el préstamo para comprar su sistema solar para ayudarle a trabajar con mayor eficiencia y además mejorara la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel is a farmer who works raising coffee, corn, and beans.  He has his own plot of land where he produces his crops.  

In the community where Juan Manuel lives, there isn’t access to electricity, so he has to travel long distances in order to charge his cell phone.  Additionally, he has to spend money to purchase kerosene and candles for lighting.  This also creates an obstacle for his work as a coffee harvester, because not having good lighting holds things up and he can’t remove the pulp from the coffee beans quickly.  

Because of this, Juan Manuel needs this loan to be able to buy a solar power system to help him work more efficiently and also to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.  He’ll be able to guarantee that his son (who isn’t yet in school) will have good lighting when it’s time to do homework and school assignments.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system that will help him to improve his quality of life and facilitate his work.

loans.name: Juan Eduardo

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 46 años, casado, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logró terminar la escuela primaria y luego  la falta de recursos económicos lo llevó a trabajar desde muy chico para poder sustentar sus necesidades. A pesar de tener un trabajo que le demanda mucho tiempo y esfuerzo, él no se negó buscar cualquier medio para salir adelante y superarse, su esposa María ha sido su gran apoyo tanto moral como económico y junto han podido sacar a sus hijos adelante, dándolesn educación y un techo donde cobijarse,  su casa queda ubicada en la ciudad de Latacunga, de la provincia de Cotopaxi perteneciente a  la República del Ecuador,
Juan se dedica a dar mantenimiento a vehículos grandes, en trabajos de suelda desde hace varios años atrás, su esposa es muy hábil en la máquina de coser por lo que ella se dedica prestar sus servicios de maquiladora para una fábrica de ropa en Quito, Juan heredó de su padre la habilidad para trabajar en sueldas de todo tipo, Juan se dedica a esta actividad desde 8 a 10 horas cada día paralelamente con las actividades del hogar que incluyen el apoyo a su esposa en la educación y guía de sus hijos.
Con la experiencia que ha adquirido a través de los años y experimentando el crecimiento que ha tenido su taller en los últimos meses Juan  se siente preparado para dar un paso de crecimiento para lo cual solicita un crédito que lo utilizará en la compra de más herramientas y materia prima que le hace falta, esto ayudará a mejorar sus estilo de vida y el de su familia, dándoles la educación que él no tuvo la oportunidad de obtener en su juventud. 
Juan y su familia agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Juan is a 46 year old man and is married. Thanks to the efforts of his parents he managed to finished primary school but lack of money led him to start work at a young age to support his needs. Despite having a job that demands a lot of his time and effort, he did not refuse to find any method to succeed and improve himself. His wife Maria has been his great support both morally and economically. Together they have been able to support their children, giving them an education and a roof over their heads. His house is located in the city of Latacunga, in the Cotopaxi province in Ecuador. 

Juan has been doing welding work servicing large vehicles for several years. His wife is very skilled with the sewing machine and she lends her services to a garment factory in Quito. Juan inherited from his father the ability to work with all types of welding machines. He does this work for eight to ten hours a day and, in parallel, helps with household activities which include supporting his wife in the education and guidance of his children. 

With the experience he has gained over the years and the growth his shop has experienced in recent months, Juan feels ready to take a step towards growth which is why he is requesting a loan which he will use to buy more tools and raw material he needs. This will help improve his lifestyle, giving his children the education he did not have a chance to obtain in his youth. Juan and his family are thankful to Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador and to Kiva for making the growth of his work and personal life possible.

loans.use: to buy more tools and raw material for his workshop and in this way contribute to the education and guidance of his children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge  de 65  años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y 4  hijos de edad mayor quienes trabajan y aportan a la casa para suplir las necesidades básicas. Jorge se dedica como ayudante en un taller  automotriz  y además  es  un comerciante  que  posee una venta de ropa casual para niños mujeres y hombres el cual es atendido por su esposa  dicho negocio está  ubicado en el centro de la ciudad de su residencia, lugar que es muy apto para este tipo de negocio, debido a que transita una gran cantidad de personas.  Jorge es  hombre visionario que desea obtener mayores  ganancias las cuales le permitan darle una vida mejor a su esposa y a sus hijos  es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar una mayor cantidad de ropa en diferentes tamaños, colores y estilos, de manera que pueda captar la atención de más clientes  y  de esta forma aumentar las ventas que le generen mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 65 years old. He lives with his wife and four adult children who work and support the family providing their basic necessities. Jorge works as an assistant in an automobile shop and he is also a merchant who has a business selling casual clothing for women, children and men. His wife takes care of the business which is located in the center of the city where he lives. It is a good place for this type of business as many people pass by.

Jorge is a visionary man who wants to obtain more profit which would allow him to provide a better lifestyle for his wife and children. So he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy a greater quantity of clothing of different sizes, colors and styles so that he can attract the attention of more clients and increase his sales which would generate greater economic income.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of clothing of different sizes, colors and styles so that he can attract the attention of more clients and increase his sales.

loans.name: Lafoai

texts.en:
Lafoai is a 48 year old married woman with 12 children. She has a small plantation and grows beans, tomatoes, egg plants, etc.to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. 

Lafoai has requested a loan to buy wires, chemicals, seeds,etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2015. With her profits, Lafoai hopes to extend her business and to save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weedspray, seeds, wires,etc.

loans.name: Samphas

texts.en:
Samphas, 32, is a married woman from Kampong Speu Province and she has two children. To make a living, she manages and operates a farming business, grows and sells rice and rice to the local dealers. So far, she has been involved in this business for more than ten years. She is able to make an income of USD 2.00 per day, on average.  

Recently, some parts of her house have deteriorated and they need to be fixed to provide a suitable living for the household. Due to the lack of fund, she has applied for a Kiva loan via HKL to pay for her house renovation. She and her family will be thankful to the lenders for helping them with the loan funded to improve their living standard.

loans.use: to pay for her house renovation, which is very much needed

loans.name: Gloría María

texts.es: Gloria de 35 años, reside en un municipio del Atlántico llamado Baranoa, conocido por su potencial para la ganadería, el cultivo de frutas, hortalizas y tubérculos.  Esta emprendedora mujer desde la comodidad de su hogar ofrece a sus vecinos y conocidos deliciosas comidas típicas de la Región Caribe; su experiencia en la elaboración de comidas es muy amplia, ella tuvo por muchos años un restaurant, del cual desistió puesto no le permitía cuidar a sus cinco hijos menores de edad.  Hoy en día cuenta con una clientela fidelizada quienes todos los días de la semana pueden consumir sus comidas a precios asequibles.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar víveres necesarios para la preparación de sus comidas. Con esta inversión espera obtener mejores utilidades puesto que comprará al por mayor a precios más tentadores.  Su meta a futuro es nuevamente abrir un local y colocar un restaurant con empleados.
texts.en:
Gloria is 35 years old and lives in a municipality of the atlantic named Baranoa. It is known for its potential for livestock and the cultivation of fruit, vegetables and tubers. 

From the comfort of her home, this enterprising woman offers her acquaintances and neighbors delicious traditional Caribbean dishes. She has extensive experience in preparing food, she had a restaurant for many years which she had to leave because it did not allow her to take care of her five young children. Today she has a loyal customer base who can eat their meals every day of the week at affordable prices. 

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy necessary supplies to prepare her meals.  With this investment she hopes to obtain better profits since she will buy wholesale at lower prices. Her future goal is to once again open a store front and have a restaurant with employees.

loans.use: to buy supplies needed to prepare meals.

loans.name: Wilson Rolando

texts.es: Wilson tiene 20 años de edad es soltero vive con sus padres en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar, pertenece a la ventanilla rural Mushuc Pakari,  el se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, solicita el crédito para la compra de ganado para engordarlos y luego vender para ganar alguna cosita y ayudar a sus padres, su sueño es mejorar en la agricultura y en la ganaderia, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Wilson is 20 years old and single. He lives with his parents in Guaranda in the province of Bolivar. He belongs to the Mushuc Pakari communal bank. He works buying and selling cattle. He is requesting a loan to buy cattle to fatten and later sell them to make some profit and help his parents. His dream is to improve his farming and livestock raising. In his spare time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn 06 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hoa is 34 years old and she is married.She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for 7 years.
Hoa lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover this region often suffered by natural disasters such as floods, drought. 
In 2014, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. 

Hoa has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. The main hardship that Hoa faces is lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Eneida Esther

texts.es: Hace 10 años Eneida administra su negocio de alquiler de equipos requeridos por el sector de la construcción;  andamiaje, cerchas, gatos, tablones, formaletas. Este negocio lo inicio su esposo hace más de 20 años, pero al fallecer ella asumió la administración del negocio, un reto muy grande para su vida. Aunque en el camino su principal desafío es mantener fidelizada su clientela, su entusiasmo, dedicación y experiencia han sido su fortaleza para continuar con este negocio familiar. Actualmente requiere un capital adicional, para la reparación de los equipos de construcción y adquirir equipos adicionales que le permitan mantener en funcionamiento su actividad, para lo cual está aplicando para su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, pues su meta es prosperar en su negocio y personalmente aspira a remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eneida has been managing the construction equipment rentals business for 10 years. The equipment she rents includes: scaffolding supports, cross beams, construction jacks, wooden planks, and formwork. 

She started this business with her husband more than 20 years ago. But since his death, she assumed the managing of the business, which was a very big challenge in her life. Although her main challenge in the process is maintaining customer loyalty, her enthusiasm, dedication, and experience has been her strength in continuing with this family business. 

Recently, she is in need of additional capital to repair and to acquire equipment, which will keep her business in operation. For this she is requesting her first Credikiva with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Her goal is to thrive her business. Her personal goal is to remodel her house.

loans.use: to repair the construction equipment and to acquire additional equipment

loans.name: Transito

texts.en: Trancito is 58 years old and lives in the rural village of Caparrapi in Cundinamarca. She runs a store that sells liquor and also has a few “tejo” pitches (a local game similar to boules), and supports her 5 children as best she can (in the picture there are two of her daughters and a granddaughter). She works with her daughter every day of the week for up to 8 hours, and has been working in the region since 1990. She has a clear vision of how she would like to improve her business: purchase new furniture and improve her “tejo” pitches to attract more customers. This way she will also have more money to prepare for parties and national holidays in the region. She hopes that with this loan she may formalize her business and become more competitive in the local market. Eventually she dreams of being able to afford a new home.

loans.use: purchase new furniture and improve her “tejo” pitches

loans.name: Susana Maria De Las Mercedes

texts.es:
Susana   es una mujer  ecuatoriana de 33 años de edad, nunca se casó vive en la ciudad de Latacunga, perteneciente a  la provincia de Cotopaxi la casa donde vive es familiar, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logro terminar sus estudios primarios, y desde muy joven Susana trabajó muy duro para ayudar en los gastos de la familia y ella ha sido un gran aporte para el hogar, no tiene hijos. Ella se dedica al duro trabajo de la preparación de comida rápida desde hace muchos años atrás y pese al  esfuerzo que demanda esta actividad ella no se da por vencida. Vive en la ciudad de Latacunga es un sector céntrico de la ciudad.
La actividad a la que se dedica se la heredo de su madre, no cuenta con el  apoyo de  nadie por lo que Susana se dedica todo el tiempo a dar servicio de alimentación, se acercó a la Fundacion  ya que su hermana es nuestra cliente, hoy solicita un crédito para la compra de materia prima para su negocio. Es una cliente con mucha experiencia en el negocio, ella ofrece salchipapas, papi pollo, hamburguesas etc. Sus clientes potenciales son los niños y jóvenes del centro de la ciudad
Susana agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal y poder tener más comodidades en su hogar.
texts.en:
Susana is a 63-year-old Ecuadorian woman, never married. She lives in the city of Latacunga, which belongs to the Cotopaxi province. She lives in the family home.

Thanks to her parents' effort, she was able to finish primary school. From a very young age, Susan worked very hard to contribute to family expenses, and she has been a great source of support for the household. She does not have children.

For many years now, she has made a living by doing the hard work of fast food preparation. In spite of the effort that this demands, she is undaunted and provides for her family. She lives in the city of Latacunga in a central region of the city. She inherited her trade from her mother. She does not have any outside help, so Susana dedicates all of her time to providing food service.

She approached the Foundation because her sister is a client. Today she is requesting a loan to purchase raw ingredients for her business. She sells salchipapas [type of kebab], fried chicken, hamburgers, etc. Her potential customers are the children and teens in the city center.

Susana is thankful to the Alternativa Foundation in Ecuador and to Kiva for making possible her growth in her work and personal life. She is thankful to be able to have better amenities in her home.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her business, with the goal of growing in her personal and work life

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo, de 61 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, debido a la situación económica de su familia no pudo seguir con sus estudios, está casado y su esposa trabaja vendiendo plantas, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solamente uno vive con ellos, los otros 3 están en el extranjero.

Ricardo, se dedica a la venta de cinchos, rasuradoras, agujas y muchos artículos más, se ha dedicado a este negocio durante 20 años, su tío fue quien le enseño este tipo de negocio y decidió dedicarse a eso; casi toda su vida se ha dedicado a la venta de artículos, el lugar de trabajo está aproximadamente a 8 kilómetros y se transporta en bus.

El préstamo será para comprar ropa, ganchos andinos, cinchos, etc. este préstamo mejorara el inventario de productos que vende, porque surtirá su venta y tendrá la facilidad de poner un local propio en donde pueda vender sus productos.

Los sueños de Ricardo, es poder poner su local propio y que sus hijos en un futuro encuentren un buen trabajo y si es posible que se dediquen al comercio.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 61, has a ninth grade education but was unable to continue because of his family's economic situation.  He is married and his wife sells ornamental plants.  They have four children but only one still lives at home.  The other three live abroad.

Ricardo sells belts, shavers, needles and many other items.  He has been in business for 20 years, having learned the trade from his uncle.  For nearly all his life he has been selling merchandise.  His workplace is eight kilometers away and he takes a bus to get there.

The loan he is requesting is to buy clothing, hair accessories, belts, etc.  The loan will improve his stock of products and increase sales.  This will allow him to set up his own shop.

Ricardo's goal is to open his own shop.  He also wants his children to find a good job in the future, hopefully in the commercial area.

loans.use: To buy clothing, hair accessories and belts.

loans.name: Marie Sultane

texts.fr: Marie Sultane, 48 ans, est divorcée et mère de six enfants. Elle vit à Bizoton, quartier populaire du centre-ville de Port-au-Prince. Elle vend des céréales dans un petit coin de sa maison : elle y entrepose des sacs de riz, de maïs, de petit-mil, de haricots, etc. Elle exerce son activité depuis dix ans. Pour développer son commerce, plusieurs microcrédits lui ont été octroyés. Marie Sultane demande un nouveau crédit pour acheter plus de céréales et ainsi éviter des ruptures de stock
texts.en: Marie Sultane, aged 48, is divorced and the mother of six. She lives in Bizoton, a working-class district in the downtown of Port-au-Prince. She sells grains in a little corner of her house, where she has sacks of rice, corn, pearl millet, beans, etc. Marie Sultane has had her business for six years. To develop her commerce, several micro-loans have been granted to her. She is asking for a new loan to purchase more grains, thus to avoid inventory shortages.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of corn and pearl millet

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.en:
Maria Edith is married and has two sons, ages 13 and two. She works selling women's clothing. Her store is located in her house and she opens it from Friday to Sunday.

Maria Edith is asking for a loan to buy pants, blouses, and T-shirts for her business. She says that her business has been growing and her goal is to get more clients and improve her business.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, and T-shirts for her business.

loans.name: Virginia Lisseth

texts.es:
Virginia, requiere de un nuevo financiamiento para reactivar su negocio con la mercadería que sus clientes necesitan, comprara arroz, frijol, maíz, gaseosas, jugos, pan, galletas, entre otros productos con los que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes.
Los recursos económicos que le dan los créditos los utiliza para mantener el inventario de la tienda lo más surtido posible, ya que de esta manera puede obtener los ingresos necesarios para ir subsistiendo junto a su familia.
texts.en: Virginia needs a new loan to boost her business with merchandise her customers need. She will buy rice, beans, corn, soft drinks, juices, bread, cookies and other products with which she can better serve her customers. She uses the economic resources that the loans give her to keep the store's inventory as varied as possible because this allows her to obtain the necessary income for her and her family to subsist.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, soft drinks, juices, bread, cookies, and other products with which she can better serve her customers.

loans.name: Silvia Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa una señora con 33 años de edad, soltera, dedicada a la preparación y venta de alimentos en la ciudad de Medellín, trabaja toda la semana dependiendo las ventas que tenga.

Una persona trabajadora y humilde que no cuenta con mucho capital de trabajo, busca un préstamo el cual lo utilizara para surtir su negoció con desechables, caféy snack.

Con un propósito de seguir luchando hasta tener su casa propia y tener una vida económica estable.
Impacte la vida de esta mujer, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Rosa is 33, single and works making and selling food in the city of Medellin. She works all week depending on the level of sales. 

She is a hardworking person and humble and doesn’t have much working capital, she is looking for a loan to stock her business with disposables, coffee and snacks.  

Her goal is to continue fighting to have a house of her own and a  life with a stable financial situation. 
Make an impact in this woman’s life, lend today.

loans.use: to stock her business with disposables, coffee and snacks.

loans.name: Saidjafar

texts.ru: 35 летний житель района Сарбанд, Саиджафар на протяжении 18 лет является мельником. Это ремесло передалось ему от отца, и он очень горд этим. У него самого 4 детей, три мальчика и одна девочка.  Рядом с домом он открыл небольшой магазинчик и продает там муку. Однако магазин и сама мельница нуждаются в ремонте, и Саиджафар оказался в трудном финансовом положении. Саиджафар обратился за кредитом. На полученные средства он планирует сделать ремонт, расширить торговую точку и приобрести зерна пшеницы. Саиджафар очень надеется, что Вы окажите ему помощь в его трудном и, к сожалению уже редком ремесле.
texts.en: Saidjafar, a 35-year-old resident of the Sarband district, has been a miller for 18 years. He inherited this trade from his father, and he is very proud of this. He has 4 children - three boys and one girl. He opened a small store near his house and sells flour there. However, the store and the mill need repairs, and Saidjafar found himself in a difficult financial situation. Saidjafar requested a loan to make repairs, expand his store and buy wheat grain. Saidjafar really hopes that You will offer him help in his difficult and, unfortunately, rare trade.

loans.use: to make repairs in his mill, expand his store and buy wheat grain

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
Ester works hard to support her family. Ester is married and has a manicure/pedicure service business in the Philippines.

Ester requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like nail polish, nail cutter, etc. for her business.

Ester has been in this business for 5 years now.

Ester would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like nail polish, nail cutter, etc. for her business

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Veronica works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Veronica is borrowing PHP 29000 through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Veronica has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Maria Lina

texts.es:
Lina, de 48 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera y tiene tres hijos, su primer hija estudio profesorado en educación básica, está soltera y aún vive con ella, su segundo hijo estudio hasta noveno grado y trabaja como ayudante de transporte de carga y vive con ella tambien y su tercera hija estudia parvularia y tiene 6 años de edad.

Lina, se dedica a trabajar desde hace 10 años en un programa de comunidades solidarias, ella capacita a los beneficiarios de este programa.- Antes trabajaba como empleada doméstica en la capital; ahora trabaja a 2 kilómetros de su casa y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agricolas como maiz, fertilizante e insecticidas para mejorar sus cosechas, con este crédito podra cubrir su necesidad y sus cultivos estarán bien fortalecidos. 

El sueño de Lina es, que su ultima hija estudie y que sea profesional, también quiere mejorar su cocina y arreglar el piso de su casa.
texts.en:
Lina is 48 years old and studied up until high school. She is a single mother and has three children. Her first daughter obtained her teaching degree in basic education, is single, and still lives with her. Her second son studied up to ninth grade, works as an assistant in shipping transportation, and lives with her as well. Her third daughter is in preschool and is six years old. 

Lina has been working for 10 years in a community solidarity program. She trains the beneficiaries of this program. Before, she worked as a domestic worker in the capital. Now she works just two kilometers from her house and her schedule is from 7:00am to 3:00pm.

She needs the money from the loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies like corn, fertilizer, and insecticides in order to improve her crops. With this loan, she will be able to cover her needs and her crops will be strengthened. Lina's dream is for her youngest child to be able to study and become a professional. She also wants to improve her kitchen and fix the floor in her house.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies like corn, fertilizer, and insecticides in order to improve her harvests.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
