María es una joven Ecuatoriana, nació en la ciudad de Latacunga, provincia de Cotopaxi, vive en un sector de la ciudad donde su población se dedica a la mecánica industrial. María tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera, y vive en la casa de sus padres. Gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres culmino sus estudios hasta la universidad, es Ing. En Contabilidad y Auditoría. Va a emprender su propio negocio, con la venta de ropa por catálogo de forma ambulante. Lo que le permitirá mejorar su estilo de vida. 
María usará el crédito solicitado para su nuevo negocio, espera con este crédito tener nuevos ingresos. María agradece a Kiva y Fundación Alternativa por ayudarle a cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
María is a young Ecuadorian, born in the city of Latacunga, in Cotopaxi province. She lives in a sector of the city where people work in industrial mechanics. María is 24 years old, single and lives in her parent's house. Thanks to the efforts of her parents, she completed her studies at university. She has a degree in Accounting and Auditing. She is going to start her own business by selling clothing from catalogs itinerantly. This will permit her to improve her lifestyle.

María will use the requested loan for her new business, hoping with the loan to create new income. María is grateful to Kiva and Fundación Alternativa for helping her to fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to start her business selling clothing by catalog which will allow her to improve her life style.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new welding plant for her husband's iron accessories manufacturing business.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad’s son has been driving an auto rickshaw for many years. It has been depreciating with the passage of time. He sold his old rickshaw and wants to buy a new rickshaw. He belongs to an ultra poor family and has been feeding his children. Now his children are growing old, and their needs as well. 

Irshas has been making savings for many days to buy a new auto rickshaw for her son, but at the time of purchasing money has become short. Therefore, she has requested a loan for her son so that he can buy a new rickshaw with the contribution of savings. Irshad is a 54-years old woman, living with her six children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

She hopes that now her son would be able to generate more income. She is very happy after taking this loan. She thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw with the contribution of savings for her son.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana is 40 years old woman and mother of three children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, where her husband is a fruit seller by profession.  He sells fruits e.g. apples, bananas, grapes etc. Her husband is only responsible to feed the entire family and manage house hold.

Farzana's husband needs to purchase different types of fruits for reselling purpose so that her husband can increase the size of business, improve his sales growth and earn maximum profit. But due to unfavorable financial position her husband is not in condition to purchase fruits for his business purpose.

Therefore Farzana has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. So that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for business purpose. 
She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's fruit business

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit completed her fourth Kiva loan,which brought great development and expansion to her business, and she hopes that her fifth Kiva and Nor Horizon partnership will also be profitable and pleasant.
Anahit is 59 years old and she lives in the city of Vanadzor of the Lori Region. Anahit’s husband is back from the Russian Federation and being unemployed he greatly helps his wife in her business, especially on the days that Anahit must go to the city of Yerevan to buy a new assortment of dishware and ceramics for her shop.
She has been engaged in this business for more than 20 years and she is very happy that in her region's worst economic situation she has an opportunity with the help of her business to solve her family's needs. This time Anahit has asked for a loan from Nor Horizon and hopes to have Kiva lenders support in order to add to a number of her shops goods by buying a new assortment of tea and coffee sets, vases, and stylish porcelain cups.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of tea and coffee sets, vases, and stylish porcelain cups

loans.name: Maria Rosalia

texts.es:
Rosalía, de 49 años de edad, está casada, tiene 4 hijos pero vive junto a sus 3 hijas en una casa rentada, su hijo ha emigrado al extranjero para ayudarles más económicamente.

Rosalía, tiene una tienda desde hace 10 años en la cual invierte la mayoría de tiempo, porque de ahí obtiene los ingresos necesarios para tener lo necesario en el hogar. 

Rosalía, necesita el crédito para invertir más en su tienda, ya que los clientes de su barrio le están solicitando nuevos productos y por el momento no tiene el dinero suficiente para surtirla.

Rosalía, sueña con crecer económicamente y que sus hijos sean éxitos en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosalía is 49 years old, is married and has four children. She lives with her three daughters in a rented house. Her son has emigrated to another country to help them more economically.

Rosalía has had a store for 10 years. She spends most of her time here as from it she gets the income necessary to provide for the needs of her household.

Rosalía needs the loan to invest more in her store as the clients of her neighborhood are requesting new products and at this time she does not have the money to stock it.

Rosalía dreams of growing economically and for her children to be successful in life.

loans.use: to invest in more products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Carlos Francisco

texts.es:
Una persona trabajadora, luchadora y llena de vida. Así es el señor Francisco  un hombre con 63 años de edad, y aun velando por el bienestar de su familia.

Por medio de un carro que adecuo el señor se dedica a surtirlo de frutas y verduras, de allí salen los ingresos mínimos para cubrir las necesidades básicas que su hogar amerita.  

Pide un apoyo económico con el cual abastecerá su carro de frutas, verduras y comprara un pesa.

Su mayor sueño es brindarle a su familia las comodidades necesarias para el sustento, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y tener una vejez sana y plena.

Usted puede hacer parte de este sueño, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Francisco is a hard-working person, fighter and full of life. He is 63 years old and still ensuring the well-being of his family. Through a cart that he adapted, he makes a living supplying it with fruits and vegetables. From that he gets the minimum income he needs to cover the basic needs that his home deserves. 

He is asking for a loan which he will use to supply his fruit and vegetable cart and to buy a scale. His biggest dream is to give his family the necessary amenities to live, improve the conditions of his home and to have a full and healthy old age. You can be part of this dream, make a loan.

loans.use: to supply his fruit and vegetable cart and to buy a scale.

loans.name: Maria Fernanda

texts.es:
María Fernanda es una joven de 20 años de edad, una mujer que busca el progreso, ser alguien en la vida, apoyar incondicionalmente a su madre, por ello monto un negocio de venta de frutas y verduras.

El negocio no solo lo inicio con el ánimo de apoyar económica a su familia, también busca recursos para ingresar a estudiar.

María Fernanda se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de de un congelador y/o panorámica para tener un producto nuevo en su negocio que será la venta de pescado.
texts.en:
María Fernanda is a 20 year old young woman who is searching for progress, to be someone in life, and to unconditionally support her mother. This is why she began a business selling fruits and vegetables. 
The business was not only started to economically support her family but also to generate resources to allow her to begin studying. 
María Fernanda is requesting a loan to buy a freezer and/or a refrigerated display case in order to begin selling fish in her business.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and/or a refrigerated display case in order to begin selling fish.

loans.name: Ana Felicia

texts.es:
A sus 41 años la señora Felicia, luego de que su esposo quedara sin empleo, inicio a vender mercancía desde su casa.

Con su esfuerzo y motivación ha logrado salir adelante con su familia, consiguiendo los recursos para lograr cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
 
Pide un apoyo económico en la Corporación Interactuar para la compara de camisas, jeans y calzado, con lo que espera aumentar sus ganancias y mejor sus ventas.

Quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de pagarles la educación a sus hijos y sabe que de la mano de Interactuar lo lograra.
texts.en: At 41 years old, Felicia, after her husband was left without employment, began to sell commodities from her house. With her effort and motivation she has been able to support her family, getting the resources to cover the basic necessities of her home. She is asking for a loan with the Interactuar Corporation to buy shirts, jeans and shoes. She hopes to increase her earnings and improve her sales. She wants to keep fighting to complete the dream of paying for her children's education and she knows that she will reach that goal in the hands of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy shirts, jeans and shoes. She hopes to increase her earnings and improve her sales.

loans.name: Lizeth Yamile

texts.es: Lizeth de 25 años en compañía de su cónyuge fueron propietarios de una tienda de víveres,  sin embargo no tuvieron los resultados que esperaban; decidieron cerrarla y su cónyuge empezó  a laborar con una empresa, mientras que Lizeth con su carisma y espíritu emprendedor, desde su casa inició su negocio de alquiler de lavadoras.  Todos los días a partir de las 7 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m. ofrece este servicio a sus vecinos, en el barrio en el que reside en el municipio de Baranoa, su empeño y dedicación han permitido que esta mujer tenga éxito en esta actividad, hasta tal punto que su demanda se ha ido incrementando por ello está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar más lavadoras.  Esta inversión permitirá que pueda prestar más servicios y tener más ganancias.  Así mismo su desafío es incrementar su número de clientes y pronto podrá lograrlo mediante esta financiación.  Su meta a futuro es realizarle adecuaciones a su casa.
texts.en: Lizeth is 25 years old. She and her partner were owners of a grocery store, however they did not have the results that they were hopping for. They decided to close it and her partner began to work with a company, while Lizeth with her charisma and enterprising spirt, began a business of renting washing machines from her home. Every day from 7:00 A.M. to 6 P.M., she offers this service to her neighbors in the neighborhood that they live in, in the city of Baranoa. Her determination has allowed her to be successful in this job, so much so that demand has been increasing and for that reason she is applying for a CrediKiva. This is the first funding that she is asking for from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy more washing machines. This investment will allow her to loan more services and have more earnings. Also, her dream is to increase her client numbers and soon she will be able to achieve it through this loan. Her future goal is to make adjustments to her home.

loans.use: to buy more washing machines.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, tiene una familia formada por su esposa y un hijo, todos viven juntos, tiene como negocio la comercialización de ganado, de manera independiente lo desarrolla hace mas de 8 años, un tío le enseño el oficio, actualmente lo realiza con ayuda de su hijo, no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero.
Con el préstamo comprara ganado, para tener más animales, lo engordara y luego lo ofrecerá a sus clientes, pretende recuperar la inversión con mejores ingresos, espera que el ganado no se enferme para que se mantenga en óptimas condiciones y sea más fácil venderlo.
Sus sueños son cancelar su deuda y ofrecerle a su familia un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en: José has a family formed by his wife and son. They all live together and have a cattle marketing business, which they have carried out independently for more than 8 years. An uncle taught him this business and now he does it with help from his son. He does not have any economic help from the outside. He will buy cattle with the loan, to have more animals, and will fatten them and later offer them to his clients. He is looking to recover the investment with a higher income. He hopes that the cattle do not get ill so that they stay in optimal conditions, which will make them easier to sell. His dreams are to pay off his debt and offer his family and more worth lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy cattle and have more animals.

loans.name: Oscar Adilio

texts.es: Oscar de 33 años de edad es padre soltero vive en casa propia con su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene 15 años de dedicare a la actividad agrícola de la cual ha podido salir adelante, almacena sus cosechas en sacos como muestra la fotografía y luego vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Oscar is 33 years old. He is a single father who lives in his own house with his daughter. He works growing corm and sorghum. He has been working in agriculture for 15 years and it has allowed him to get ahead. He stores his harvests in sacks as shown in the photo and later sells his product in the area around where he resides. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc to be able to have greater economic income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Ingris Maricela

texts.es:
Ingris, de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltera y vive en casad de madre y sus abuelos.

Ingris, le ayuda a su madre a cuidar una granja de pollos la cual tiene desde hace 2 años, esa es su única ocupación por el momento, ella tiene que estar pendiente de la comida y el agua para los pollos.

Ingris, necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de granos básicos.

En el futuro Ingris, quiere obtener un crédito más grande para mejorar su vivienda, ya que en unos días entrara a trabajar como empleada y eso le facilitara cancelar sus créditos.
texts.en: Ingris is 22 years old. She went to school until high school. She is single and lives with her mother and grandparents. Ingris helps her mother to take care of a chicken farm that she has had for 2 years. That is her only job at the moment. She has to be looking out for the food and water for the chickens. Ingris needs the loan to buy fertilizers for growing basic grains. In the future, Ingris wants to get a bigger loan to improve her home. She starts work as a maid in a few days and that will help her repay her loans.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for growing basic grains.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolás es un hombre con 38 años de edad, trabajador y responsable, que se dedica a realizar trabajos de construcción, con lo cual logra brindarle una estabilidad económica a su familia conformada por dos hijos menores y su esposa.
Labora de lunes a sábado entre 7 y 8 horas dependiendo la cantidad de trabajo que tenga y sabe que gracias a sus clientes tiene un buen negocio.

Su mayor sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su casa ya que con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando y  sabe que con los colaboradores del portal kiva y la corporación interactuar lo lograra.

Con el fin de ser más competitivo en el mercado y aumentar sus clientes Nicolás busca un préstamo con el que comprara una pulidora, radial y demás herramientas de mano que sean de su utilidad.
texts.en:
Nicolás is a 38-year-old man who is hardworking and responsible. He works in construction, through which he is able to provide economic stability for his family, made up of his two young children and his wife. He works from Monday to Saturday, between seven and eight hours depending on the amount of work he has. He knows that thanks to his customers, he has a good business. 

His biggest dream is to improve the condition of his house, since over time it has deteriorated. He knows that with the collaborators on the Kiva site and with Corporación Interactuar, he will be able to achieve this. With the goal of becoming more competitive in the market and increasing his customers, Nicolás is looking for a loan, with which he will buy a sander, a circular saw, and other hand tools that will be useful to him.

loans.use: to purchase a sander, circular saw, and other hand tools that will be useful for him.

loans.name: Brisas San Juan Group

texts.en:
The quaint and picturesque village of San Juan la Laguna is on the shores of beautiful Lake Atitlan in the Western Highlands of Guatemala. This is the home of the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank, Brisas San Juan, with a membership of seven industrious women. They mainly make brightly colored textiles that are very popular with the international tourists who arrive daily.   

Brisas San Juan has just completed the second loan cycle that was granted them last October. The group demonstrated a great deal of punctuality and responsibility in repaying their loan. They have all been successful in their small businesses.  Ana, the 45-year-old president of the group, is an example of their success.  She is the owner of a small business that makes and sells cotton-threaded woven fabrics such as scarves, shawls, bedspreads, and aprons.  At first her business was out of her home. When she saw that she needed to support her husband, she began offering her products in shops and is now selling them wholesale. Ana is requesting a new loan to buy quality threads and yarns in many colors in order to attract more customers.  

In addition to the loan, Ana receives monthly trainings through the Friendship Bridge’s informal education program. The combination of loans and education is called Microcredit Plus. These trainings are on many important topics that she and the other members can put to use on a daily basis. Each month the Trust Bank Facilitator provides an in-depth lesson on subjects like self-esteem, self-empowerment, and women’s & children’s health. The women also gain valuable business tools for managing their businesses. They learn about accounting, bookkeeping, marketing, pricing, and customer relations.  

Ana and the other members of Brisas San Juan are exceedingly grateful to Kiva investors for having confidence in them, and supporting them with loans that help them to have a better quality of life and look forward to a brighter future. Thank you!

loans.use: to buy quality threads and yarns in many colors in order to attract more customers

loans.name: Carminda

texts.es: Carminda  de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 25 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, cuando ya está su cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializar los productos  en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Carminda is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and son. She has been making a living in agriculture and growing corn, beans and millet for 25 years. When the harvest is ready, she stores it in the silos shown in the photo to later sell the products in nearby towns. She has lots of regular customers. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticide, herbicide, etc., to be able to continue with her crops since that is her only source of work, and thus to gain more income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, insecticide, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Alba Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es madre soltera y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender ropa, con gran esfuerzo ha superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado. 

Rosa  es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.

Actualmente tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un buen capital busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de ropa para dama, caballero y niño.

Le dedica 4 horas diarias a su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es seguir creciendo con su negocio, y así poderle ofrecer una mejor estabilidad económica a sus hijos, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en: Rosa is a single mother and began to sell clothing a long time ago. With great effort, she has overcome many problems that have come her way. Rosa is a very hard-working person who, thanks to her daily effort, has managed to support her children, giving them a good quality education. At the moment, she has many good orders from her clients and since she does not have a good equity, she is looking for a loan to buy a supply of clothing for women, men and children. She dedicates 4 hours every day to her business. Her biggest dream is to keep growing her business and be able to offer a better economic stability to her children. She knows she can achieve it in the hands of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy a supply of clothing for women, men and children.

loans.name: Fabio Andres

texts.es:
Fabio es un hombre de 28 años de edad, que guiado por sus sueños y su fanatismo inicio un negocio de reparación de motocicletas, adquirió experiencia trabajando en negocios similares y se lanzo al emprendimiento por mejorar sus entradas de dinero.

Fabio no tiene hijos, tampoco tiene pareja, solo trabaja para mantenerse y apoyar incondicionalmente a su madre, su deseo es tener a futuro un taller de mecánica con mínimo 5 empleados serviciales y dispuestos a tender cualquier eventualidad.

La fuerte competencia en el sector hace que Fabio piense en como atraer mayor número de clientes, la manera más eficiente que se le ocurre es tener la maquinaria y la herramienta suficiente para desplazarse al lugar de la eventualidad, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar herramienta de mano y tener suficientes existencias para dejar en el local y para atender domicilios.
texts.en:
Fabio is a 28 year old man who guided by his dreams and his fanaticism started a business repairing motorcycles. He gained experience working in similar businesses and ventured into entrepreneurship to increase his income.

Fabio has no children nor a partner. He works to maintain and support his mother. His wish in the future is to have a garage with at least five attentive employees prepared for any possibility.

The intense competition in the sector has Fabio thinking about how to attract a greater number of customers. The most efficient way he can think of is to have the machinery and sufficient tools to go to the place with the problem. So he is requesting a loan to buy hand tools and have enough stock to leave in his shop and do house calls.

loans.use: to buy hand tools and have enough stock to leave in his shop and do house calls.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz es una humilde trabajadora residente en el municipio de Medellín con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. Es madre de 3 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida trabajando en su propia cafetería.
Le dedica 12 horas diarias a su negocio.
De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son el alto costo de las materias primas y la inseguridad del sector.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de inventario de bebidas, snacks e ingredientes para la preparación de pasteles y empanadas.
texts.en: Luz is a humble worker who lives in the city of Medellín with a life full of dreams, hopes, and the best wishes for her family. She is the mother of 3 children, for whom she has always had the courage to take responsibility so that their lives were the best. Nowadays, she makes a living working in her own coffee shop. She dedicates 12 hours a day to her business. The main difficulties that she faces in her work are the high cost of the raw materials and the insecurity of the area. She is asking for a loan to buy an inventory of soft drinks, snacks and ingredients to make cakes and empanadas.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of soft drinks, snacks and ingredients to make cakes and empanadas.

loans.name: Samaila

texts.en: Samaila is a Babban Gona farmer from Tajiri Village. He joined Babban Gona so that he could realize better yields on his farm. Since joining Babban Gona, Samaila no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to pay for his children's school fees. Through Babban Gona’s input loan he will have access to top-of-the-range farm inputs such as fertilizers, herbicides, and improved seeds. These will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the national average in Nigeria, which will increase his income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Samaila now has the opportunity to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: To purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his farm’s yields

loans.name: Mujeres Guerreras Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por  5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “MUJERES GUERRERAS” una de ellas es la Sra. Natividad  de 57 años divorciada  y con 2 hijos, la Sra. Natividad  se dedica ya hace 3 años a la venta de abarrotes en un pequeño local  todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos, Con el fruto de su esfuerzo la Sra. Natividad  ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar en la educación de sus hijos. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales es por eso  que la Sra. Natividad  trabaja mucho, Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más mercadería (Arroz, leche, golosinas, ETC) y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a la Sra. Natividad se encuentra sentada y se le distingue con una casaca color ploma, se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en: This is a group comprised of 5 responsible people who have distinct businesses. Here are the members of the community group Mujeres Guerreras. One of them is Natividad, who is 57 years old, divorced, and has 2 children. Natividad has been working for 3 years selling groceries from a small store every day in order to get ahead and to be able to send her children to school. With the fruit of her efforts, Natividad has been able to improve her home and support her children's education. As she continues to improve her business, he greatest desire is that her children will be professionals, and this is why she works a great deal. She will use the offered loan to buy more merchandise (rice, milk, candy, etc) so that she will have more income. Natividad can be found seated in the photo, wearing a grey jacket. She sends a hug to Kiva and Edaprospo and is grateful for the loan she is offered as it makes her progress possible.

loans.use: buy rice, vegetables, milk, etc.

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla is 50 years old, married, and has four children to provide for. To earn a living and able to help her husband as a driver, she engaged in a sari-sari store business as one of the source of income for the family. 

As a mother she wants for the best of her family, to achieve this she wants to increase her income so she decided to availed a loan to buy more grocery items for sell and to increase her inventory that will generate more income.

Perla's plan for the future is to save money to sustain the needs of her children's education.

loans.use: To buy more grocery items for sell.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita works hard to support her family. She has a live-in partner and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Anita requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Anita has been in this business for 5 years now. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en:
Anselma is 61 years old and is married with six children, one of whom is still in school. Anselma works very hard to provide for them.

Anselma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Anselma has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, bath soap, shampoo, detergent soap, diapers, etc. 

Anselma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is 45 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Divina works very hard to provide for them.

Divina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Divina has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, canned goods, soft-drinks, shampoo, etc. 

Divina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Angeles

texts.en:
Angeles is 44 years old and is married with 6 children. With 3 children currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Angeles runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, sanitary pads, detergent soap, noodles, cereals, etc. 

Angeles has been in this business for 7 years, and she sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sanitary pads, detergent soap, noodles, cereals, etc. 

In the future, Angeles would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, sanitary pads, detergent soap, noodles, cereals, etc.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Dr. Michael started running track at the age of 9 and continues to do so as a sprinter and jumper. He has competed nationally and internationally, trained for the Olympic Trials, and is extremely passionate about training other athletes. It was through his experiences in track and field that Dr. Michael became drawn to chiropractic medicine.

Early in his career he suffered a serious back injury. However, with the help of a sports chiropractor he was able to compete again with full abilities in a very short period of time. From then on, Dr. Michael was convinced that there is a major role for chiropractic medicine to play in the health field. Following up on that belief, he attended schools of chiropractic medicine in New York and Los Angeles, and obtained his Doctorate of Chiropractic from the Cleveland Chiropractic College in 2011.

With a strong athletic background, Dr. Michael went on to specialize in sports chiropractic and rehabilitation. Dr. Michael is extremely active in his field, consistently attending chiropractic conferences both locally and abroad, always looking to expand his ability to treat patients effectively. He is a doctor for the Reebok Crossfit Games, National Pro Grid League (NPGL), and the La Reign. Dr. Michael strongly believes in the body’s ability to heal itself, and is of the view that the primary role of chiropractic medicine is to assist this process. To that end, he employs a number of chiropractic techniques in his individualized approach and treatment protocol. He also offers diet and nutrition analysis, workout regimens, lifestyle advice, and physiotherapy techniques. 

Dr. Michael is now practicing out of a shared space with a fellow colleague in West Hollywood. This loan will allow him to purchase equipment and other materials that will further expand the range of services the business can provide and improve the overall income of the business.

loans.use: to pay for business equipment

loans.name: Laban

texts.en:
Laban is a prominent coffee trader in the Nyakabingo area of Uganda. He is 33 years of age and a father of 4 children, aged 8, 6, 4, and 2 years.  2 of his children go to school. 

Laban is a coffee grower and works for 10 hours each day. He started growing coffee in 2007 in the Nyakabingo area with the aim of generating his primary household income. However, he is also engaged in cattle rearing as a side income. 

Laban is borrowing 3,000,000 UGX to purchase agricultural inputs such as fertilizers to improve his yields and increase his output. His clients are the coffee traders of Nyakabingo. 

In time, Laban hopes to educate all of his children. His major challenge is changes in weather in his area. He describes himself as an honest client and calls for more assistance to all coffee growers in his area

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and boost his coffee production.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is a young Mexican-American girl, the oldest of six siblings, who grew up in a notorious Los Angeles community. It wasn’t easy, but through hard work, she worked hard and graduated from UC Irvine with a B.A. in economics and a minor in Chicano Latino studies. She is currently working as an administrative assistant for a Roman Catholic church and is a committed practicing Roman Catholic. Since 2007, she has been a catechism teacher for teenagers and is currently seeking a master’s in pastoral theology.

Jessica loves to bring joy to all those around her, and she wants to turn that into a business. She is currently planning to buy a photo both that she can rent out for all kinds of events. What makes this booth different from the plethora of booths in L.A. and Orange County  is that it is an open photo booth that comfortably allows for up to 25 people to be captured in the shot. 

With the help from Kiva, Jessica will be able to purchase the photo booth and develop her business.

loans.use: to pay for a photo booth

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new moto rickshaw body for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for her husband's blacksmith's shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase inventory, set up a website and order business cards and product labels

loans.name: Lauriano

texts.es:
Lauriano tiene 40 años y se dedica a producir café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: orgánico y de comercio justo el cual comercializa por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socio, Lauriano tiene más de 20 años de experiencia en la producción de café y este es su principal fuente de ingresos, Su mayor deseo es que sus 4 hijos puedan tener las oportunidades que él no ah tenido.
Lauriano quiere certificar su cafetal bajo la norma de producción orgánica lo que le permitirá tener mejores precios por su café además de darle la oportunidad de hacer el cultivo amigable con el ambiente, con las ganancias obtenidas por el valor agregado de su café Lauriano piensa darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
Un préstamo ayudaría a Lauriano a tener mejores ingresos por su café y hacer su cultivo de café un cultivo sostenible y amigable con el ambiente.
texts.en:
Lauriano is 40 years old and grows coffee under various certifications such as organic and commercial, which he sells as a member of COCAFCAL. Lauriano has more than 20 years of experience in growing coffee and this is his primary source of income.

His greatest wish is that his 4 children have the opportunities that he did not have. Lauriano wants to certify his regular production of coffee on his coffee plantation as organic. This will permit him to have better prices and provide opportunity to grow in an environmentally-friendly manner. With the profits for his hard work Lauriano plans to give his children a better quality of life.

The loan will help Lauriano to have better income from his coffee and make his coffee crop sustainable and environmentally-friendly.

loans.use: to buy organic fungicide, insecticide, manure, and coffee plants to convert farm to an organic farm

loans.name: Angelee

texts.en:
Angelee is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Angelee is 25 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines. Angelee requested a 29,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell to her customers.

Angelee has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell to her customers

loans.name: Gloria Estela

texts.es:
Gloria, a sus 52 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hija.  
Desde que era joven, comenzó a laborar en el campo de la confección, pues le colaboraba a una Tía que tenía una empresa grande y allí se encargaba de pulir y revisar las prendas, cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad fue vinculada a la empresa, donde laboró por algunos años. 

Hace aproximadamente 15 años, Gloria se independizó y montó su taller con gran empuje; afianzó su taller con la esperanza de que las ventas aumentaran y así fue, comenzó a conseguir contratos con terceros. De esta forma ha obtenido los ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 

Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar una máquina recubridora, con el fin de brindarle a sus clientes una prenda bien elaborada y con excelente terminación, así aumentará los contratos y podrá generar mayores ingresos para poder cumplir el sueño de tener una línea propia, además de brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras  personas. 

Ella sabe que Interactuar es un gran apoyo para el crecimiento de su empresa!
texts.en:
Gloria, 52, lives with her husband and her daughter.
Since she was young, she began working in the field of sewing.  She collaborated with an aunt who had a large company and there she was put in charge of buffing and inspecting the articles of clothing.  When she came of age, she became linked to the company, where she worked for several years.
Approximately 15 years ago, Gloria went independent and started her workshop with a big push.  She secured her workshop with the hope that the sales would increase and so it was.  She began to get contracts with third parties.  In this way, she has obtained the income to sustain her family.
With the loan she is requesting, she wants to buy a covering machine with the goal of being able to offer her customers a well-made article of clothing with an excellent finish.  In this way, she will increase contracts and will be able to generate better income in order to fulfill her dream of having her own line as well as offer employment to other people.
She knows that Interactuar is a great support for the growth of her company!

loans.use: to buy a covering machine for her shop.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Ann works hard to support her family.

She has a gasoline retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from electronic mobile load retailing. Ann is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase additional containers of gasoline to sell to her customers for her gasoline retailing business.

Ann has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of gasoline to sell to her customers

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
A sus 39 años, Diana tiene mucha energía y empuje para trabajar en su negocio de masajes y belleza
Vive en una humilde casa con su madre.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza corporal y para la realización de masajes.

Con este negocio y un préstamo podrá sacar a delante su negocio
texts.en:
At 39 years old, Diana has lots of energy and drive to work in her massage and beauty business. She lives in a humble house with her mother. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of body and beauty products as well as products for performing massages. With this business and a loan, she will be able to move forward with her livelihood.

loans.use: to purchase body and beauty products, and products for performing massages.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
A $600.00 is offered to Marciana to improve her business. Marciana lives in Ermera, And most of her daily income is from selling goats so she still happy to do her business. 

She started her business in 2013, with her own working capital of $500.00 .She was going to add money with her principal amount to buy another goat, because it has become her activity. 

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goats in the future. And she will to has a management for her business. She also cultivates pigs.

loans.use: To buy goats for her buying and selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom at home to improve access to sanitation and a water source.

loans.name: Natermina

texts.en:
Natermina is a business women. She wants to buy clothing according her clients' taste, but she does not have enough money. She is applying for a loan of 600 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to augment her working capital so she can buy more clothing to sell such as  jackets, children's clothing, shorts, and pants. 

Natermina is taking this loan because she wants to improve her business. She has been involved in her business activities since 2012, and she started with her own working capital of 800 USD. She earns a good income from selling her clothing because many people like her stock, so she is still happy to do her business. 

Natermina also raises animals like pigs, chickens, and dogs.

loans.use: to buy jackets, children's clothing, shorts, pants, and other clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nakhong Group

texts.en:
Bounthai understands the difference the water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families.  Bounthai knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Bounthai purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Bounthai is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Ramil

texts.en:
Ramil is a 28-year-old single man. He lives with his family in the Agdash region. Ramil cannot get higher education because his family's income is low. He has been working as a gardener for six years, growing seasonal fruits and selling them at the local bazaar. His monthly income is 180 AZN.

Raising and selling fruits is very popular in Azerbaijan. People sell seasonal fruits at the local bazaar, and buyers use the fruits to make delicious kinds of jams, pies, cakes and juice. They also use dry fruits because they're very healthy. 

Ramil’s situation is very hard. He needs to raise fruits and care for them but the lack of water in the region creates a problem for him. Because of this problem, productivity has fallen and Ramil can’t cover the family’s needs. He has applied for a loan of 1000 AZN to be able to supply water for his garden each week. This will increase productivity again and the family’s income will rise.

loans.use: to supply of water for the garden

loans.name: N2 Thái Yên C-Chính Fresh Fruit Group

texts.en:
Mrs Thảo is 39 years old and she is married.
 
She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fruit for more than 10 years. Thảo lives in Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover the market need is low in this region. 

In 2015, Thảo joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Thảo has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. The main hardship that Thảo faces is lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit and vegetable to resell. This photo was taken in a member's house who does photographer and married-dress service.


With her business profit, Thảo hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids and for her children to graduate from college.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Crislyn is 21 years old and is 4th of the four children in the family. Her mother Wilma a member of NWTF, supports the family through her general store business in the Philippines.

Crislyn is studying Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management and is currently in the 2nd of this 4-year course.

Wilma is borrowing PHP 6500 to pay for tuition fees of her daughter Crislyn for the first semester of the school year 2015-16.

Crislyn plans to graduate and be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay 2nd year tuition fees for her B.Sc. in Hotel and Restaurant Management

loans.name: Nosheen

texts.en:
Nosheen is responsible mother of two children and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for ten years. Her husband is responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family. 

Her husband needs to carry out maintenance on his taxi because the current condition is not good.  It requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to do the maintenance on his taxi. Therefore Nosheen has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Nosheen's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily. And provide the better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Nosheen  also plans to make savings with the profit amount of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in future.
Nosheen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to her husband's taxi

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
A $1000.00 is offered to Maria to improve her business. Maria lives in Ermera and she is a business woman. She started to open her business in 2013, with her own working capital of $500.00 . She was going to add money to her principal amount to buy more additional supplies to keep in her store, such as sauce, sardines, detergent, aqua, cooking oil, noodles, Including soft drinks and hard drinks and other things to sell. 

It has become her activity so she is happy to do it every day. She is happy also with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she will manage her business with this loan.

loans.use: To buy sauce, sardines, detergent, aqua, cooking oil, noodles, Including soft drinks and hard drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey, a 31-year-old, is a proud father of two young children, aged 5 and 2. He owns a retail shop which is located in Karangara, and he works for 10 hours a day. The business started in 2005. The major aim was to generate income to support the family. He has an additional income from a motorcycle taxi. 

Godfrey is borrowing 1,200,000 UGX from the institution with the objective of purchasing more stock for the shop. His clients are the dwellers of Karangara. His vision is to build himself a better house and improve on his housing conditions. His major challenge is the increasing competition from other retailers. He describes himself as an honest gentleman. He appreciates the role of the institution towards improving people’s standards of living.

loans.use: To buy retail stock items for sale

loans.name: Javier Manuel

texts.es:
A sus 23 años de edad Javier inicio con un negocio de venta de bolsos, una actividad inspiraba en su madre, ya que el principal motivo es poder apoyarla incondicionalmente en el sostenimiento de su hogar y juntos trabajar por mejorar sus condiciones de vivienda. 

Es un joven que labora diariamente 12 horas todos los días de la semana.

Javier quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de mercancía como lo es bolsos, morrales, zapatos, ropa y parte del préstamo será destinado para cambiar la carpa de su puesto de trabajo que está en muy mal estado.
texts.en: 23 year old Javier began a business selling purses, a business inspired by his mother, as the main purpose of his work is being able to support her unconditionally in supporting the household and working together to improve their living conditions. He is a young man who works 12 hours daily, every day of the week. Javier wants a loan to buy merchandise such as purses, backpacks, shoes, clothing and part of the loan will be used to change the canopy of his vendor stand as it is in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as purses, backpacks, shoes, clothing

loans.name: Jose Yury

texts.es:
José es un hombre con 48 años, soltero y sin hijos, que desde hace poco inicio a trabajar en un taller de bicicletas, laborando tres días a la semana 10 horas cada uno.
Su deseo es tener su propio negocio, ofrecer nuevos servicios y generar empleo  a las personas que lo necesiten.

Con el fin de incrementar sus ganancias José solicita un crédito en la Corporación Interactuar  con el que comprara pinturas y marcas en aluminio.

Su sueño y como el de algunos micro-empresarios es el de tener su vivienda propia, José sabe que con la ayuda de los colaboradores y prestadores del portal Kiva su sueño se cumplirá.
texts.en: José is a 48 year old single man who a short time ago began to work in a bicycle shop. He works three days a week, 10 hours per day. His wish is to have his own business, offer new services, and generate employment to those who need it. With the goal of increasing his earnings, José seeks a loan from Interactuar in order to buy paints and aluminum signs. His dream, like that of many microbusinessmen, is to have his own home. José knows that with the help of his collaborators and lenders from Kiva his dream will come true.

loans.use: to buy paints and aluminum signs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new Juki sewing machine and stitching items for her eldest daughter.

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Maria, con 50 años de edad, es soltera y muy trabajadora.

Desde hace 14 años, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una sala de belleza que inició como alternativa para generar recursos que le permitieran tener una buena vida, trabaja sola todos los días, la actividad la aprendió a través de una amiga y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector por la calidad de su servicio. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar los diferentes utensilios e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, tinturas, shampoo, acondicionador, entre otros), así estará en la capacidad de generar un empleo directo y además podrá prestar un mejor servicio, pues los clientes estarán más cómodos, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe. 
Maria con su perseverancia y proyección hacia un futuro, desea hacer crecer su salón de belleza, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo para madres cabezas de familia, dando como resultado un mejor bienestar no sólo para su familia, sino que aportará para que otras personas puedan disfrutar de mejores condiciones para vivir.
texts.en:
Maria, 50 years old, is single and hardworking.

She has owned her own business for 14 years, a beauty salon that started as an alternative to generate income to allow her to have a good life. She works alone every day. She learned this business through a friend and slowly she started learning more and honing her technique. This has allowed her to become known in the area for the quality of her service. 

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy different tools and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, color, shampoo, conditioner, etc.) so that she can be directly employed and also provide a better service. This will allow her customers to be more comfortable which will improve her sales and earnings. 

Maria, with her perseverance and looking ahead to the future, wants to grow her hair salon so that she can generate more employment opportunities for single mothers improving the well-being not only for her family but contributing so that others can enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy different tools and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, color, shampoo, conditioner, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bamboo and planks for her husband's sheltering services.

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es:
Ella es Gloria es una sorprendente mujer de 45 años de edad, madre cabeza de familia de la sorprendente cantidad de 7 hijos y a todos ellos les da calidad de vida con su negocio ambulante de venta de alimentos, vende comidas rápidas y productos fritos.

La vida de Gloria se torna difícil el solo generar los recursos para mantener su hogar hace que sea una tarea difícil, pero tiene a sus hijos que la apoyan, le ayudan en el trabajo eso la motiva y la inspira a crecer y darlo todo por sus muchachos.

Con la ilusión de tener activos fijos para mejorar su actividad y poder sacar sus implementos a la calle, Gloria quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una freidora, molino eléctrico, una vitrina, insumos e ingredientes.

Tu ayuda, servirá para que gloria tenga los activos principales para tener un negocio digno de venta de alimentos.
texts.en: Gloria is an amazing woman who is 45 years old, and she is the head of a family of 7 children. She supports them all through her business as a street vendor selling food. She sells fast foods and fried products. Gloria's life is difficult to be the sole generator of income to support her household, but she has to support her children and they in return support her and help her with the work. This is her reason for being and inspiration to grow her business, giving everything on behalf of her children. With the goal of having fixed assets in order to improve her business and be able to take her items into the street, Gloria wants to seek a loan to buy a fryer, electric grinder mill, display case, supplies and ingredients. Your help will help Gloria have the items she needs to have a business with dignity selling her food.

loans.use: to buy a fryer, electric grinder mill, display case, supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Nady Luz

texts.es:
Luz, una señora con 28 años de edad, madre de dos  menores, dedica a trabajar una hora diaria en la cría de ganado, un negocio heredado por su familia y el cual le ha permitido salir adelante con sus hijos.

Un motivo por el cual esta mujer lucha día a día es por cumplir el sueño de pagarles la educación a sus hijos, pues se preocupa mucho por su bienestar.

Solicito un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el cual comprara alimentos al por mayor y renovara el lugar donde tiene su ganado.

Usted puede hacer parte de este sueño, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Luz, 28, is the mother of two young children.  She makes a living working one hour a day raising livestock, a business she inherited from her family and which has allowed her to forge ahead with her family.
A reason for which this woman struggles day after day is to fulfill her dream of paying for the education of her children, since she worries a lot about their well-being.
She is requesting a loan from the Interactuar Corporation with which to buy feed wholesale and renovate the place where she keeps her livestock.
You can be part of this dream.  Lend today.

loans.use: to buy feed wholesale and renovate the place where she keeps her livestock.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce, who is in her mid 50s, is married with six children, one of them is still in college and the five are grown-up. She has been running a catering and stock keeping business since 1992. She works from 5am to midnight daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Joyce's tens loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase stock in her catering business and has paid back her loan successfully. She used the profit to pay college fees and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to restock the out of stock items in her catering business. She dreams of buying a good car.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in her catering business

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn is 29 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Arlyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Arlyn requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

Arlyn has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Arlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products to amass more stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new moto rickshaw body for her husband.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
A sus 45 años de edad Mary logro consolidar un negocio de confecciones a tereros gracias a la experiencia que obtuvo viendo a sus amigas, trabaja de de lunes a sabado 10 horas diarias.

Quiere lograr ofrecer trabajo a las personas mas necesitadas por lo que solicita un credito para la compra de maquinas y tela de alta costura, con lo que podra mejorar su produccion.

Con su espiritu emprendedor, quiere seguir luchando con el sueño de comprarse una vivienda y mejorar sus situacion economica.
texts.en:
At 45 years of age, Mary was able to consolidate a sewing business third-party thanks to the experience she obtained watching her friends.  She works Monday to Saturday for 10 hours a day.
She wants to be able to offer employment to needy people for which she is requesting a loan in order to buy machines and high-fashion cloth with which she will be able to improve her production.
With her enterprising spirit, she wants to continue struggling with the dream of buying herself a residence and improving her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy machines and high-fashion cloth with which she will be able to improve her production.

loans.name: Ushirikiano Kiburugwa Group

texts.en:
Silvia, in her early 30’s, She has been running a food business commonly known as mamalishe. She works from 5 am to 4pm every day and is able to make a good profit each month. Through hard work, she managed to earn enough to buy a plot of land and pay for household expenses. In the coming years, Silvia would like to build a house for her family. 

Silvia will use this loan to buy food cooking ingredients for her mamalishe business. She will share this loan with her loan group, "Ushirikiano", which consist of three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. 

This is her fifth loan cycles in Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans, all of which she repaid successfully, to buy food items like rice, sugar, cooking oil and charcoal.

loans.use: to buy food cooking ingredients for her mamalishe business

loans.name: Soem

texts.en:
Soem is a 62-year-old widowed grocer with two children who lives in the Takeo province in Cambodia. She has been doing her business for over 3 years. Her two children are factory workers. Together, they can earn around $16 each day. 

Soem would like to improve her family’s finances, so she needs a loan to buy cows to breed for calves to sell. With this loan, she will be able to have enough money to buy cows and earn more income when the cows are able to produce calves. In the future, Soem is going to save money to expand her business, and build a new proper house.

loans.use: to buy cows to breed for calves to sell

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.en:
Bernardina is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Bernardina is 44 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Bernardina has a general store business in the Philippines. Bernardina requested a PHP 40000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Bernardina has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Bernardina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: This loan will be used to build a bathroom at their home to improve access to sanitation and water sources.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new Juki sewing machine and some packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand.

loans.name: Digna Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Digna una mujer de 42 años de edad, persona recursiva, interactiva que se dedica a la venta de alimentos, es madre de 4 hijos inicio su negocio hace poco con el ánimo y entusiasmo de apoyar económica su hogar.

Digna tiene un sueño. Pagar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar la calidad de vida y tener un restaurante.

Los principales inconvenientes para trabajar que tiene Digna son el espacio, ella usa las instalaciones de su hogar para trabajar,  pero poco a poco ha ido creciendo y conforme tenga mayor demanda pensara en mudarse a un espacio dedicado de lleno a la preparación de alimentos ya atención al cliente.

Con el propósito de aumentar la producción de  almuerzos Digna quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos, arroz, carne, verduras, frutas, salsas, plátano, ñame, papa, granos, azúcar.
texts.en:
Digna is a 42 year old woman. She is a resourceful, interactive person who sells food. She is the mother of 4 children and she started her business a short time ago with spirit and enthusiasm, in order to support her home.  

Digna has a dream. To pay for her children's education, improve their quality of life, and have a restaurant. 

The main problem Digna has for work is space. She uses the facilities in her home to work, but little by little she has grown and as demand increases, she will think about  moving to a space dedicated fully to preparing the food and serving customers.

In order to increase lunch production, Digna wants to ask for a loan to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, vegetables, fruit, sauces, plantains, yams, potatoes, grains and sugar.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, vegetables, fruit, sauces, plantains, yams, potatoes, grains, and sugar.

loans.name: Maria Leyda

texts.es:
María, de 52 años de edad, está soltera y vive con sus hijos y su nuera, siempre se ha  dedicado a la  comercialización de granos básicos.

María, tiene más de 30 años de cultivar granos básicos, ese fue un legado que se a transmitido de generación a generación en su familia, sus hijos también lo practican; además de cultivar María, tiene una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad.

Con el crédito María, comprará semilla mejorada para obtener una cosecha más productiva y protegiéndola de plagas que se presentan como amenazas potenciales para la cosecha.

María, desea comprar graneros para mantener los granos protegidos de las plagas.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old. She is single and lives with her children and her daughter in law. She has always sold basic grains.

María has been growing basic grains for more than 30 years. This was a legacy that was transmitted from generation to generation in her family. Her children also do this. In addition to farming, María has a store where she sells staple products.

With the loan, María will buy improved seeds to obtain a more productive harvest and protect it from pests that are potential threats to the harvest. 

María wants to buy graneries to to keep the grains protected from pests.

loans.use: to buy improved seeds to obtain a more productive harvest and protect it from pests.

loans.name: Channa

texts.en:
Channa is 21 years old, single and from the Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Currently, he is studying as a Management major in his third year at a university in the city. Channa is also working as a security guard at a micro finance institution, making around USD7.27 each day. 

Now he is lacking the finances to pay his third-year university fees, therefore he would like a loan. This loan will help Channa have enough finance to go through the third year at university successfully. 

For his future goals, he dreams of having a good job with a decent salary and having his own house.

loans.use: to pay his third-year university fees for a B.Sc in Management

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz dary una señora con 48 años, casada y madre de tres hijos con 10, 20 ,22 años, dedicada a vender productos de consumo diario en los hogares.
Trabaja toda la semana 10 horas cada dia.

Luz dary como el resto de madres anhelan poder brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos, que son el motivo por el que se esfuerzan dia a dia.

Con el prestamo solucitado ella abastecera su negocio con productos de la canasta familiar, lo cual le ayudra a mejorara sus ganancia y aumentar sus cliente.

Su sueño es seguir creciendo y formalizar su negocio, con el fin de comprarse una vivienda y pagar la educacion de sus hijos.
Con su aporte este sueño podra continuar, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Luz Dary  is a 48 year old woman. She is a married mother of three children, aged 10, 20 and 22. She sells products of daily home consumption. She works all week for 10 hours a day.

Luz Dary, like all mothers, longs to be able to give her children the best. They are the reason she works hard day to day. 

With the loan she is asking for, she will stock her business with staple products, which will help her improve profits and increase her customers.

Her dream is to keep growing and formalize her business in order to buy a house and pay for her children's education. 

With your contribution, this dream con continue. Make a loan today.

loans.use: to stock her business with staple products, which will help her to improve profits and increase customers.

loans.name: Noemia

texts.en:
Nomea has been involved in business activity since 2012. She started her business with her own working capital of $1000.00. She has a shop for her business in the market, so she is selling every day. She also cultivates animals, like pigs and chickens. 

Nomea is a business women. So she is requesting a loan of $1000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to buy additional supplies to keep in her store such as coffee, candy, flour, sardines, sugar, eggs, biscuits, soy sauce, slippers Including soft drinks and other things to sell. She is happy because, with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she can build her business bigger in the future and her income can be increased.

loans.use: To buy coffee, candy, flour, sardines, sugar, eggs, biscuits, soy sauce, slippers Including soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to renovate her house

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 32 years old and married with three children. She lives in Ozamiz City. She invests her time in her sari-sari (general store) where she generates income to support her family. 

Mary Joy is a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, where she recently took a loan for 15,000 PHP to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items in order to continue her business in their community. Mary Joy is thankful for the help.

loans.use: to restock her general store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease land to expand her farming activity.

loans.name: Clydie

texts.en:
Clydie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Clydie is 41 years old and has three children who are in school.

Clydie has a buy and sell rug business in the Philippines. Clydie requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more rugs to sell to her customers.

Clydie has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Clydie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more rugs to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, rock and iron in order to be able to begin construction of a retention wall and provide greater security for her family.

loans.name: Renefe

texts.en:
Renefe is a 45-year-old married woman with four children, two who are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Renefe has a food-production and vending business in the Philippines. Renefe has been in this business for 20 years. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients.

In the future, Renefe would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Alicia Alexandra

texts.es:
Alicia es clienta de Fundación Alternativa, es madre soltera y vive junto a su pequeño hijo en la ciudad de Santo Domingo.
Ella es una señora trabajadora, cuenta con su negocio de venta de salchipapas, con su primer crédito pudo mejorar la apariencia de su negocio, compró más sillas y carpas para sus clientes. Contaba con el negocio en la vía, ahora ella al ver la necesidad de un local donde vendan comida decidió ponerse un nuevo negocio, por ello acude a Fundación Alternativa la institución que ha podido apoyarla, gracias a este crédito podrá adquirir enseres necesarios como vitrinas, congelador, mesas, sillas, cocina para abrir su negocio de venta de desayunos, almuerzos y meriendas sin dejar a lado al negocio de salchipapas, ya cuenta con el local y varios enseres pero era necesario un crédito para que pueda aperturar el local.
Alicia tenia planificado esto desde meses atrás, incluso hasta había hablado con los empleados de empresas aledañas al sector que posiblemente iba a abrir un comedor y si serian sus posibles clientes, su encuesta salió satisfactoria por eso no lo pensó dos veces y pudo ya felizmente abrir su negocio.
Alicia es una microempresaria muy feliz, por el apoyo brindado, por la confianza, es clienta fiel a la institución y desea seguir creciendo junto a nosotros para poder también dar trabajo a madres que necesiten llevar un ingreso a su hogar.
texts.en:
Alicia is a client of Fundación Alternativa. She is a single mother who lives with her young son in the city of Santo Domingo. She is s hard-working woman who has a business selling salchipapas (a local street food). With her first loan she was able to improve the appearance of her business buying more chairs and canopies for her clients. Her business is in the street and now she sees the need to have a cafe to sell food.

She has decided to open a new business so she has come to Fundación Alternativa, the institution that supported her. Thanks to this loan she will be able to acquire needed equipment like display cases, a freezer, tables, chairs and stove to open her business selling breakfast, lunch and dinner while continuing with her salchipapa business. She has the shop and various equipment but she needs a loan to open the cafe.

Alicia planned this months in advance, including talking to employees of companies in the area about opening a cafe and if they would be potential clients. Her findings came out positive and she has not given it another thought and now happily she can open her business.

Alicia is a very happy micro-entrepreneur with the support and confidence shown in her. She is a faithful client of the institution and she wishes to continue to grow with us and be able to provide work to mothers who need to take an income home to their family.

loans.use: to buy equipment to open a new cafe.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fresh fish and school supplies

loans.name: Irma Luz

texts.es:
Luchadora, trabajadora, una mujer aguerrida que batalla diariamente contra la desigualdad y la falta de oportunidades que se presenta en la región, ella llamada Irma quien es madre de 3 hijos de 8, 6, 3 años de edad, inicio con un negocio de venta de carne, una medida que tomo por necesidad económica ya que su pareja no daba abasto para los gastos del hogar.

Su negocio ha representando el progreso de su hogar, se proyecta mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, ofrecer empleo, montar una carnicería y lo más importante brindad estabilidad y una vida digna a sus hijos.

Irma quiere solicitar un préstamo para seguir con el progreso de su negocio, dicho préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de un lote de cerdos, una balanza electrónica, un juego de cuchillos, bolsas plásticas para empacar la carne.
texts.en:
Irma is a tenacious, hardworking, and courageous woman who battles daily against the inequality and lack of opportunity that exist in her region. The mother of three children who are 8, 6, and 3 years old, Irma started a meat sales business. She took this measure out of economic necessity, as her spouse was unable to keep up with the household expenses. 

Her business has represented progress for her household. She aims to improve household conditions, offer jobs, open a meat market, and—most importantly—provide her children with stability and a decent life.

Irma wants to request a loan in order to continue the progress of her business. She will invest the loan in the purchase of a batch of pigs, an electronic scale, a set of knives, and plastic bags for packaging the meat.

loans.use: to buy a batch of pigs, an electric scale, a set of knives, and plastic bags for packaging the meat.

loans.name: Emin

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of KPP-UMKM’s clients, Emin, who is 65 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children. She has four sons. Both Emin and her husband are food merchants and they sells traditional food called “Bubur”, which is based on rice. Emin and her husband pull together to increase the family's income.

Emin has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 7,200,000 rupiah. This loan will be used to buy and build a bathroom at their home to improve access to sanitation and a water source. She wants to have access to water and sanitation for families. Her family income is still not enough to a build water source with cash, but they are able to repay the loans received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to build a bathroom at their home to improve access to sanitation and a water source.

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
José es un hombre soltero de 27 años de edad trabajo parte de su vida como empleado en una carpintería, donde adquirió sus conocimientos con los cuales monto su propio negocio de ebasnitería, fabricando muebles que se acomodan a las exigencias de los clientes.

Vive con su hijo de 2 años de edad, mantiene a sus padres, su sueño es pagar la educación de su hijo, enseñarle el trabajo y que este le sirva de base para que genere ingresos y busque su propio destino.

Quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra del insumo principal que es madera, este insumo será destinado para la fabricación de camas, camarotes, espejos, muebles, cajoneras etc.
texts.en:
José is a single 27-year old man. He worked part of his life as an employee in a carpentry workshop where he gained the knowledge he used to start his own cabinetmaking workshop building furniture customized to his customers’ requests.

He lives with his two-year old son, and takes care of his parents. His dream is to pay for his son’s education, to teach him the job and so this will serve as a foundation for earning an income and finding his own destiny. 

He wants to request a loan to buy the main supplies which are wood. These supplies will be for the production of beds, cabins, mirrors, furniture, and chests of drawers, etc.

loans.use: to buy the main supplies which are wood. These supplies will be for the production of beds, cabins, mirrors, furniture, and chests of drawers, etc.

loans.name: Artita

texts.en: Artita signed up for her membership with PMPC a few years ago and obtained the needed capital to start a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Artita was able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune and set aside much of her profit as her personal savings. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Fe is 31 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Fe has a buy and sell of construction supplies business in the Philippines. Fe requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of construction supplies to sell.

Fe would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of construction supplies to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra una joven con 21 años de edad, madre soltera, trabajadora y  luchadora, que se dedica a verder mercancia desde su casa, lo que le brinda los ingresos minimos para el sustento de su hijo.

Debido a un accidente que sufrio meses atrás se encuentra con poco capital de trabajo y aun sufre algunas molestias fisicas, es por esto que tiene la ezperanza de comprar mas mercancia como blusas, jeans y calzado asi podra recuperar un poco su negocio.

Su sueño es continuar trabajando para asi podrele brindar a su hijo un mejor furturo y pagarle su educacion.
Usted puede ser parte de este sueño, haga un prestamo.
texts.en:
